NK085(ru)006:1: // rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rnam bzhag go bder brjod
NK085(ru)006:2: pa spang len gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba
NK085(ru)006:3: bzhugs so // gdod nas kun khyab bde chen rdo rje'i skur //
NK085(ru)006:4: snang stong zung 'jug zag bral chos nyid che //
NK085(ru)006:5: rdo rje slob dpon mchog gi rnam rol can //
NK085(ru)006:6: kun mkhyen tshe dbang nor bu snying dbus mgon //
NK085(ru)006:7: dbang bskur rgyud bshad dpag daka'i gnad don bkrol //
NK085(ru)006:8: rig pa'i gnas ston theg gsum chos la sbyor //
NK085(ru)006:9: mdor na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyis //
NK085(ru)006:10: lam ston yongs 'dzin kun la'ang dwangs bas 'dud //
NK085(ru)006:11: gang zhig rdo rje theg pa'i nyams len mthil //
NK085(ru)006:12: smon grol lam yin de yi bsrung sdom sgo //
NK085(ru)006:13: 'da' nyams bka' ba rdo rje'i dam tshig gis //
NK085(ru)006:14: rnam bzhag go bder bkrol te 'dir bshad bya //
NK085(ru)006:15: de la rab 'byams rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i snying po ni smin grol gyi lam nyid dang /
NK085(ru)006:16: de'i rtsa ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)006:17: de don gyi gnad 'gag tsam bkrol te 'chad na /
NK085(ru)006:18: bsrung bya dam tshig gi ngo bo /
NK085(ru)006:20: bsrung tshul ma bsrung ba'i nyes dmigs /
NK085(ru)006:22: nyams na phyir bcos bya tshul dang bdun las /
NK085(ru)006:24: gsang snying gi rgyud phyi ma las /
NK085(ru)006:25: gang zhig nan tan las mi 'gos //
NK085(ru)006:26: rmi lam du'ang dam tshig brjod //
NK085(ru)006:27: dam bca' ba ni sdom par 'dod //
NK085(ru)006:28: ces bla ma dang dkyil 'khor mdun par khas blangs
NK085(ru)006:29: pa'i sdom pa gang zhig /bsrung bya'i don khyad par
NK085(ru)006:30: can las rmi lam tsam du'ang 'da' ru med pa'i
NK085(ru)006:31: sems pa sa bon dang bcas pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:33: gsang sgor zhugs pa thams cad kyis //
NK085(ru)006:34: sgo gsum rang gi bsrung bya la //
NK085(ru)006:35: rgyal po'i bka' rtags ji ltar bar //
NK085(ru)006:36: mi 'bral sdom pa de ngo bo //
NK085(ru)006:38: gnyis pa ni sa ma y+aa'i sgra las /
NK085(ru)006:39: yal gam bcas pa'i tha tshig dang /
NK085(ru)006:42: don ji ltar bcas pa las 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir na dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)006:44: 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
NK085(ru)006:47: nges chig skyon yon skabs kyi bsgyur //
NK085(ru)006:50: dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa las //
NK085(ru)006:51: dbang dang byin rlabs thob pa yin //
NK085(ru)006:52: dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad na //
NK085(ru)006:53: mi mthun tshogs rnams tshig par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:54: zhes gsungs pa'i phan yon gyi dam tshig tu bzhag pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:58: rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:61: mi 'da' dam pa mchog gyur pa //
NK085(ru)006:62: 'dab par gyur na tshig par bshad //
NK085(ru)006:63: ces nyes dmigs kyi dam tshig tu bzhag pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:64: de yang sa gzhi dang ljon shing bzhin bsrung na
NK085(ru)006:65: dge legs kyi yon tan tha dag bskyed par byed
NK085(ru)006:66: pa'i gzhi dang / ma bsrung nas thar 'bras kyi bskyed bya thabs bcas yal ba'i phyir dang /
NK085(ru)006:67: dam pa'i tshul bzhin spyad na mi mthun phyogs kyi nyes pa tshig pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:68: nam yang 'da' ru med pa'i dam zhing /
NK085(ru)006:69: gal te de las 'das nas thar pa'i sa bon
NK085(ru)006:70: cha bcas tshig pa'i 'bras bu rtsub mos mnar ba'am
NK085(ru)006:71: phyir de skad ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:72: dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud las sa zhes bya ba bskyed pa la /
NK085(ru)006:73: ma zhes bya ba mnyams na /
NK085(ru)006:74: dngos grub thams cad ster ba nyid //
NK085(ru)006:75: ya zhes nyams na yas par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:76: dam zhes bya ba bcings pa nyos //
NK085(ru)006:77: de nyid grol na nyams pa nyid //
NK085(ru)006:78: tshig ces bya ba de 'das na //
NK085(ru)006:79: mi yi sdug bsngal myong ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:82: rgyud sde'i rnam bzhag bzhi la ltos te so so'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)006:83: spyi'i rnam bzhag rgyas par ston pa sogs yi ges 'jigs par mi zad /
NK085(ru)006:84: blo dman rnams kyi rtogs dka' zhing mang thos mkhan dag rgyud 'grel bshad dang /
NK085(ru)006:85: sdom gsum dang rtsa 'grel sogs sngags sdom ston byed kyi gzhung nyams su blta bar byos la /
NK085(ru)006:86: 'dir nyams su blang bya'i 'gag don che long tsam
NK085(ru)006:87: zhig tu ston pa la dbang bzhi'i dam tshig so
NK085(ru)006:89: spyi sdom gyi nyams bzhag ston pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:91: phung khams lha ru smin pa bum dbang gi dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)006:92: bskyed rims gsal stong chu zla'i rang bzhin can du
NK085(ru)006:93: sgoms pa mnyam bzhag gi dam tshig /shes pa tha
NK085(ru)006:94: mal du mi 'khrul zhing rtag tu lha'i 'du shes
NK085(ru)006:95: dang ma bral ba rjes thob kyi dam tshig /sha
NK085(ru)006:96: lnga bdud rtsi lnga la gtsang sme'i blo gtongs mi
NK085(ru)006:97: 'jug par longs spyod pa bza' ba'i dam tshig /rdo
NK085(ru)006:98: rje dang dril bu tshad ldan 'bras bu tshad ldan
NK085(ru)006:99: 'bral med kyi rten du 'chang ba bcangs pa'i dam
NK085(ru)006:100: tshig /snod gzhal yas khang dang bcud lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK085(ru)006:101: du shes pas 'byung lnga skye 'gro kun la log
NK085(ru)006:102: lta spang ba bsrungs pa'i dam tshig ste la dang
NK085(ru)006:103: / rlung 'byin 'jug gnas gsum dang brjod tshig tha
NK085(ru)006:104: dag sngags su smin pa gsang dbang gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:105: / ni / gtum mo'i me bsgoms pa mnyams bzhag
NK085(ru)006:106: gi dam tshig /lte 'og a thung gi mi mi
NK085(ru)006:107: brjed pa rjes thob kyi dam tshig /bza' btung gi
NK085(ru)006:108: tshogs la zas kyi 'du shes rang kha mar mi
NK085(ru)006:109: 'jug par thams cad ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byin
NK085(ru)006:110: rlabs te rol ba gza' ba'i dam tshig /nyi zhags
NK085(ru)006:111: phrug gcig rlung kha sbyor nyer gcig mi chad par
NK085(ru)006:112: byed pa bcangs pa'i dam tshig /kun rdzob rgyu'i thig
NK085(ru)006:113: le mi nyams pa byed pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:114: / ni / ste lnga / khams thig le bde
NK085(ru)006:115: ba chen pa dang tshor ba tha dag lhan skyes
NK085(ru)006:116: kyis ye shes su sher dbang gi dam tshig ni
NK085(ru)006:117: / ni / ste lnga / / brtan pa thob
NK085(ru)006:118: ma thob kyi dbye bas dngos lam gyi phyag rgya
NK085(ru)006:119: brten pa nyams bzhag gi dam tshig /bde stong ye
NK085(ru)006:120: shes chen po'i nyams dang ma bral ba rjes thob
NK085(ru)006:121: kyi dam tshig /lhan skyes snyoms 'jug gi tshul du
NK085(ru)006:122: rol ba bka' ba'i dam tshig /kun dang byang chub
NK085(ru)006:123: kyi sems la gces spras su bya ba bcangs ba'i
NK085(ru)006:124: dam tshig /shes rab kyi rang bzhin bud med kyi
NK085(ru)006:125: rigs la mi smod cing log lta spang ba bsrung
NK085(ru)006:127: snang srid dag pa rab 'byams khyab gdal chen por smin pa tshig dbang rin po'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)006:128: zung dag blo 'das chos nyid chen po'i don rtse
NK085(ru)006:129: gcig tu sgom pa mnyam bzhag gi dam tshig /yengs
NK085(ru)006:130: 'khrul gyi rtogs pas ma bslad par zung 'jug gi
NK085(ru)006:131: nyams dang ma bral ba rjes thob kyi dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:132: /chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rol pa bza' ba'i
NK085(ru)006:133: dam tshig /lta sgom gyi gnad la dus rtag tu
NK085(ru)006:134: ma g.yos par bya ba bcangs pa'i dam tshig bzang
NK085(ru)006:135: ngan gyi rtog tshogs gang ltar 'char yang dgag sgrub
NK085(ru)006:136: zhen 'dzin gyi blos ma bslad pa bsrung ba'i dam
NK085(ru)006:137: tshig ste lnga'o // gnyis pa spyi sdom gyi rnam bzhag ston pa la /
NK085(ru)006:139: yan lag gi dbye gnyis so //
NK085(ru)006:142: bla med mi spang bla ma bkur //
NK085(ru)006:143: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)006:144: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
NK085(ru)006:145: gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya //
NK085(ru)006:146: 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te //
NK085(ru)006:147: bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)006:149: 'di nyid 'bru gnon gyis 'chad pa la spyir bla
NK085(ru)006:150: na med ces pa de'i steng ngam gong na gzhan
NK085(ru)006:152: 'dir bstan gyi bla med ni dkon mchog rin chen
NK085(ru)006:153: rnam pa gsum gyi de yang phyi ltar mchod phul
NK085(ru)006:155: nang sems kyi chos nyid don dam pa'i gnas lugs stong nyid spros bral gyi ngo bo chos sku /
NK085(ru)006:156: rang bzhin gsal la 'gag med longs spyod sku /
NK085(ru)006:157: thugs rje'i rtsal cir yang ma 'gag cing phyogs lhung bral ba sprul sku ste /
NK085(ru)006:158: ngo bo gcig la ldog cha tha dad pa'i rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)006:159: bden pa dbyer med lhag pa'i chos sku chen po
NK085(ru)006:160: zung 'jug don dam pa'i ye shes la mnyams par
NK085(ru)006:162: de nyid dam tshig kun gyi rtsa ba'i gzhi lta
NK085(ru)006:163: bur gyur pas de don rtse gcig tu nyams su
NK085(ru)006:164: len dgos pa'i don gyi mi spang ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:166: byang sems rnam gnyis slob dpon drug /mched bzhi sngar gsum phyag rgya bzhi //
NK085(ru)006:167: zhes gsungs pa'i dang po dang gnad gcig pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:168: yul lhag pa don dam lhag pa kun rdzob kyi
NK085(ru)006:169: bden pa gnyis mi spangs par bshad pa'ang bden gnyis
NK085(ru)006:170: dbyer med du rtogs pa lta ba'i dam tshig te
NK085(ru)006:172: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
NK085(ru)006:173: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na //
NK085(ru)006:174: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:175: zhes pas de mngon gyur 'bras bu la dmigs pa smon pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:176: de sgrub pa'i phyir rang la gnas pa'i ye shes
NK085(ru)006:177: dang rjes mthun par sgo gsum spyod yul dang bcas
NK085(ru)006:178: pa'i snang ba tha dag lha'i sku gsung thugs kyi
NK085(ru)006:179: phyag rgya las mi 'da' bas nang bshad dag pa'i
NK085(ru)006:180: snang bar lam khyer du spyod pa 'jug sems la
NK085(ru)006:181: bslab pa ste / gsal bkra las /
NK085(ru)006:182: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che //
NK085(ru)006:183: sems can khams kyang der shes shing //
NK085(ru)006:184: snang stong gnyis med rdo rje'i sku //
NK085(ru)006:185: byas mthong zos pa thams cad kyang //
NK085(ru)006:186: sems phyir gang yang byas snang med //
NK085(ru)006:187: dran dang shes bzhin sngon btang la //
NK085(ru)006:188: dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na //
NK085(ru)006:189: theg chen sngags par ci'i phyir chud //
NK085(ru)006:191: gzhan yang kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po dri med 'od zer zhabs kyis /
NK085(ru)006:192: gzhi sems can thams cad ye dkon mchog gsum du gnas pas mi spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:193: lam ba skyed rdzogs dang gnyis su med pa'i rang
NK085(ru)006:194: bzhin don dam pa dang kun rdzob byang chub kyi
NK085(ru)006:195: sems gnyis mi spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:196: 'bras bu bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas sku gsum /
NK085(ru)006:197: de'i gsung mdo rgyud lung dang rtogs pa'i chos /
NK085(ru)006:198: de'i don la slob pa'i dge ba'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum mi spang ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:201: 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun ni ye shes kyi dbyings yin la /
NK085(ru)006:202: chos de'i chos nyid yin pas /
NK085(ru)006:203: de bas na ye shes dang chos nyid ni kun
NK085(ru)006:204: rdzob tsam du chos dang chos ni bdag nyid gcig
NK085(ru)006:206: don dam par spros pa zhi ba'i phyir gnyis su med te /
NK085(ru)006:207: de lta bu'i don gyi byang chub kyi sems yin no //
NK085(ru)006:208: de'i rtags kyi phyag rgya ni lha'i sku ste /
NK085(ru)006:209: de bas na lha'i sku gcig pu bsgoms pas gzhung las /
NK085(ru)006:210: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems //
NK085(ru)006:211: lha dang bla ma de bzhin te //
NK085(ru)006:212: zhes gang gsungs pa'i bla ma gtogs pa gsum 'dus par gyur pa yin no //
NK085(ru)006:214: bla ma bkur zhes pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)006:216: de ji ltar bkur tshul dngos po /
NK085(ru)006:219: spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang //
NK085(ru)006:220: nyams pa skong dang shes rgyud dkrol //
NK085(ru)006:221: man ngag lung gi slob dpon drug /ces pas kun
NK085(ru)006:222: gyi dam pas bkur zhing mchod 'os du gyur pa
NK085(ru)006:224: thog mar chos sgor 'dren byed rab byung gi mkhan po lta bu ni 'dren pa'i bla ma /
NK085(ru)006:225: thun mong gi rig gnas phra mo nas gsungs rab
NK085(ru)006:226: kyi dgongs don 'grol ba'i bar gyi chos 'chad po
NK085(ru)006:227: ni shes rgyud dgrol ba'i slob dpon /
NK085(ru)006:228: sngar nyam chags byung ba'i bshags 'tshams sbyar ba nas
NK085(ru)006:229: nyes ltung ci rig pa dag bshags yul du gyur
NK085(ru)006:230: pa ni nyams chag skong ba'i slob dpon /
NK085(ru)006:231: dkyil 'khor du bcug cing dbang bskur te dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:232: 'bogs pa po ni dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon
NK085(ru)006:233: / rang byung gi gnas lugs zab mo'i don mngon
NK085(ru)006:234: sum du ston pa'i zab khrid kyi gdams pa ston
NK085(ru)006:235: pa ni man ngag lung gi slob dpon no //
NK085(ru)006:238: yul las dbang ba'i rgyal po dang //
NK085(ru)006:239: khu bo pha dang ma dang mig /snying las lhag pa'i tshul blta ste //
NK085(ru)006:240: zhes pas spyi'i bla ma yul la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang /
NK085(ru)006:241: chos sgor bcug pa'i slob dpon khu bo dang /
NK085(ru)006:242: nyams chag skong ba'i slob dpon pha dang /
NK085(ru)006:243: shes rgyud 'grol ba'i slob dpon ma dang /
NK085(ru)006:244: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon mig dang /
NK085(ru)006:245: man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnying las lhag pa'i tshul du bkur zhing /
NK085(ru)006:247: mkhan po mthong ma thag tu stan las ldang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:249: k+aa ri ka las bla ma gnas pa'i sgo glegs la /
NK085(ru)006:250: lag pas dal gyi brdung bar bya //
NK085(ru)006:251: nang zhugs gus pas bla ma la //
NK085(ru)006:252: khams bde mi bde la sogs dri //
NK085(ru)006:254: gzhan yang 'dul ba rang gzhung las ni rab byung
NK085(ru)006:255: gi mkhan po pha ltar du bkur bar gsung ste
NK085(ru)006:256: ji skad du / khyod kyi mkhan po la pha'i 'du shes bzhag par bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:257: mkhan pos khyod la bu'i 'du shes bzhag par bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:259: shes rab rgyud kyi slob dpon yang /
NK085(ru)006:260: mdo sde thar pa chen po las /
NK085(ru)006:261: chos smra ba'i dge slong la gus par bla mar bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:264: chos smra ba ni bla ma'i mchog rab ste /
NK085(ru)006:265: rgyal ba'i mchod sdong chen po de bkur ro //
NK085(ru)006:267: gzhan pa sems bskyed kyi dge ba'i bshes lta bu'ang /
NK085(ru)006:269: de ni bdag gis thog med pa na sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i bshes te /
NK085(ru)006:271: nyams chag bshags pa'i slob dpon yang /
NK085(ru)006:272: su pi ti ka ri'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:273: bshags pa'i yul du gang gyur pa //
NK085(ru)006:274: de yang de yi bla ma yin //
NK085(ru)006:275: zhes pas de dang rjes mthun gyi bkur ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:276: de las khyad par du dbang bskur /
NK085(ru)006:278: de nyid ston pa ste man ngag shod pa gsum ni lhag par yang bkur ba'i yul yin par /
NK085(ru)006:280: dbang bskur rgyud grol de nyid bstan nas /
NK085(ru)006:282: de yang yul gcig la gsum ka nos na bka' drin gsum ldan dang /
NK085(ru)006:284: gcig nos na cig ldan no //
NK085(ru)006:285: gong gi gsal bkra'i lung las bkur tshul rim can
NK085(ru)006:286: lta bur gsung shing mkhas pa 'ga' zhig tshul de
NK085(ru)006:288: 'dir go barjesa pa ni don 'grel te mkhas grub
NK085(ru)006:289: du ma'i bzhed pa ltar 'thad pa dang bcas pa'o
NK085(ru)006:291: dbang bskur mchog thob rdo rje yi //
NK085(ru)006:292: bla ma la ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK085(ru)006:294: de ltar na gsang ltar sngags rdo rje theg pa'i
NK085(ru)006:295: lam gyi mchog ni dbang rgyud man ngag gsum gyi
NK085(ru)006:296: / de ston pa'i bla ma ni sangs rgyas las mnyam pa'am /
NK085(ru)006:297: lhag pa dkon mchog bzhi par blta ba gang rung
NK085(ru)006:298: gi sgo nas sgo gsum g.yo zol med par thugs
NK085(ru)006:299: ci mnyes dang bka' ci gsung bsgrub pa'i sgo nas
NK085(ru)006:300: bkur ba ste / rnam snang rgyud d+r+wa las /
NK085(ru)006:301: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
NK085(ru)006:304: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad pas //
NK085(ru)006:305: bla ma'i ba spu khung gcig mchog /ces dang /
NK085(ru)006:307: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
NK085(ru)006:308: bla ma yang ni bzhi pa yin ces so //
NK085(ru)006:309: de yang mig la rdul phra mo tshud na'ang skad cig kyang bzod blag med pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:310: snying mtshon phra mo zhig zug na dbang po gzhan
NK085(ru)006:311: yod kyang 'chi ba las ma 'da' ba bzhin du
NK085(ru)006:313: de nyid ston pa gnyis lhag par bkur bas mtshon lci rim shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:314: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)006:316: yul sngags gsum dang phyag rgya bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)006:318: rtsa ba bskyed dang las sngags dang //
NK085(ru)006:319: dam tshig las dang chos dang ni //
NK085(ru)006:320: sku nyid phyag rgya chen po bzhi //
NK085(ru)006:322: sngags la rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags /
NK085(ru)006:324: bzlas pa las kyi sngags dang /
NK085(ru)006:326: de'i sgo yig 'bras bur snang bas gsang ste ngag
NK085(ru)006:327: tu brjod par byed pa dang bcas shing shes skyob
NK085(ru)006:328: kyi las kyi log rtog gi gnyen por gyur pa
NK085(ru)006:329: ni gsang sngags / shes rab dang ye shes kyi
NK085(ru)006:330: bdag nyid dngos don rig par byed pa'i las kyi
NK085(ru)006:331: ma rtog pa'i gnyen por gyur pa nirigasa sngags /
NK085(ru)006:332: dran shes kyi bdag nyid chos kyi tshig don mi
NK085(ru)006:333: brjed par 'dzin pa'i las kyi dran nyams kyi gnyen
NK085(ru)006:334: por gyur pa ni gzungs sngags su bshad pa dang
NK085(ru)006:335: / phyag rgya la dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)006:338: phyag rgya chen po dang bzhir gsungs shing /
NK085(ru)006:339: de nyid la bca' ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:340: bsam pa gnyis gnyis su dbye ba sogs dbye bsdu'i
NK085(ru)006:341: grangs mang yang rgyas par rgyud 'grel rnams su gsal
NK085(ru)006:342: zhing / 'dir bsdus don gyi snying po ni /
NK085(ru)006:343: dag rdzogs smin gsum gyi 'jug pas yi dam lha'i bskyed rim la blo sbyangs shing /
NK085(ru)006:344: de nyid kyi sku'i phyag rgya snang la rang bzhin med pa /
NK085(ru)006:345: gsal la der 'dzin med pa ste dmigs gtad kyi
NK085(ru)006:346: blo dang bral bar chu zla'i gzugs brnyan bzhin rnam
NK085(ru)006:347: pa gsal ba / nga rgyal bstan pa dag pa
NK085(ru)006:348: dran pa gsum gyi steng du bcur nas g.yo 'gul
NK085(ru)006:349: med par bsgom pas goms pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:350: lam zhugs dag rim gyis blo sbyangs pa'i mos pas spyod ngang du nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:351: de yang rig pa phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs kyi lha'i
NK085(ru)006:352: skur gsal ba nyid kyis 'di nyid kyi khongs su
NK085(ru)006:353: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don tshangs pa nyid te /
NK085(ru)006:354: thugs thig las bzhi rdzogs nyid las mi 'da' ba /
NK085(ru)006:355: gang la snang ba de ngo bo /
NK085(ru)006:357: sngags kyang 'dir bzlas bya'i sngags lha gang yin pa
NK085(ru)006:358: de'i sa bon dang bskyed sngags sbrel ba'i snying po
NK085(ru)006:360: rgyun mi bcad pa'i tshul ni /
NK085(ru)006:361: brtson pa rab kyi chu bo'i rgyun bzhin nam /
NK085(ru)006:362: nyin zhag gcig gi nang du thun bzhi'i drug gi rnal 'byor du bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:363: 'bring gi zla ba re la dus tshig drug gam /
NK085(ru)006:366: tha mas kyang zla dus dang lo dus kyi mchod
NK085(ru)006:367: pa rgyun mi bcad pa 'bad par bya ba ste
NK085(ru)006:369: rang gi sgo gsum yid dam gyi //
NK085(ru)006:370: sku gsung thugs su mngon sbyar la //
NK085(ru)006:371: rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa ni //
NK085(ru)006:372: byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin //
NK085(ru)006:373: rab kyi chu bo'i rgyun bzhin ni //
NK085(ru)006:374: nyin gsum mtshan gsum gnyis gcig tu //
NK085(ru)006:375: ma yengs pa yi ngag gi bzla //
NK085(ru)006:376: 'bring gi zla gcig dus drug dang //
NK085(ru)006:377: dus bzhi'i bar du mi bcad cing //
NK085(ru)006:378: tha mar brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK085(ru)006:379: zla re'i ma ra ba'i dus dag tu //
NK085(ru)006:380: brtson pas 'bad de mi byed par //
NK085(ru)006:381: byang chub sa bon brlag pa yin //
NK085(ru)006:382: tshogs dang gtor ma'ang de bzhin te //
NK085(ru)006:385: yang dag lams su zhugs la byams //
NK085(ru)006:386: zhes pa 'dis rdo rje mched kyi dam tshig bstan te /
NK085(ru)006:387: de yang mched kyi dbye ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:388: de la dam bsrung ba'i tshul lo //
NK085(ru)006:390: 'gro ba tha dag gzhi rgyud bde gshegs snying pos
NK085(ru)006:391: rgyun chags su khyab pa'i don gyis ye gzhi gdod
NK085(ru)006:393: bye brag tu yang dag gi lam du zhugs pa
NK085(ru)006:394: ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bsdus pa ste bstan
NK085(ru)006:395: pa gcig pa'i mched yin pas ring pa'i mched /
NK085(ru)006:396: khyad par rdo rje theg pa sngags kyi lam la
NK085(ru)006:397: zhugs pa rnams rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bsdus pa
NK085(ru)006:398: ste lta spyod gcig tu mthun pas nye ba'i mched
NK085(ru)006:399: / de las bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gcig gi
NK085(ru)006:400: bsdus pa ni lhag par dam 'dres pas 'dres pa'i
NK085(ru)006:401: / mched / de yang bla ma gcig gi bsdus
NK085(ru)006:402: pa ni pha gcig pa'i spun dang de'i shugs kyi
NK085(ru)006:403: dkyil 'khor gcig gi bsdus pa ni ma gaca ga
NK085(ru)006:404: / mched / pa'i spun te / de dag snga ma las phyi ma nye zhing /
NK085(ru)006:405: khyad par nang 'dres la'ang pha gcig pa la ma gcig pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:406: de gnyis ka gcig pa la'ang dbang thob pa'i dus snga phyi yod na spun rgan gzhon dang /
NK085(ru)006:407: dus gcig pa ni mtshe ma lta bu ste de dag kyang phyi rim gyi nye la /
NK085(ru)006:408: de yang dbang bzhi ka rdzogs par lhan gcig tu
NK085(ru)006:409: thob pa'i spun rnams ni lhag par yang shin tu
NK085(ru)006:411: 'di dag la kun mkhyen chos rjes sems can thams
NK085(ru)006:412: cad ye gdod ma nas bdag gis spun yin pa'i
NK085(ru)006:414: sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs so cog ni bstan pa gcig pa'i mched do //
NK085(ru)006:415: lta spyod gcig pa ni mthun pa'i mched do //
NK085(ru)006:416: bla ma gcig pa ni mdzes pa'i mched do //
NK085(ru)006:417: chos lhan cig tu nyan pa ni nye ba'i mched do //
NK085(ru)006:418: dbang lhan cig tu zhugs pa ni 'dres pa'i mched de rdo rje'i spun no //
NK085(ru)006:419: zhes gsungs pa'ang don mthun cing /
NK085(ru)006:421: mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir //
NK085(ru)006:422: gang yang bdag las gzhan med cing //
NK085(ru)006:423: bde gshegs snying po'i spun yin phyir //
NK085(ru)006:424: ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin no //
NK085(ru)006:425: spyi yi mched de pha mtshan bzhin //
NK085(ru)006:426: sangs rgyas chos zhugs ring ba dang //
NK085(ru)006:427: lta spyod mthun pa nye bar bshad //
NK085(ru)006:428: pha gcig dam tshig nang 'dres pa //
NK085(ru)006:430: sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi rim pa rnam par bzhag pa las /
NK085(ru)006:431: bstan dang rdo rje'i theg pa la //
NK085(ru)006:432: zhugs pa thams cad spun du brjod //
NK085(ru)006:433: kun kyang ye shes ldan pa la //
NK085(ru)006:434: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje spun //
NK085(ru)006:435: dkyil 'khor slob dpon rig ma gcig /dbang bzhi dag gi bye brag gis //
NK085(ru)006:436: nye dbang khyad par bye brag go //
NK085(ru)006:439: de dag la rtag tu mi 'bral zhing phan 'dogs
NK085(ru)006:440: pa'i lhag bsam gyis brtse ba rgyun mi chad pas
NK085(ru)006:443: sems can kun gyi yid khyab par //
NK085(ru)006:444: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid bzhugs //
NK085(ru)006:445: de ltar bsam nas rnal 'byor gyi //
NK085(ru)006:446: dbang pos gang la brnyan mi bya //
NK085(ru)006:449: byang chub sems brten theg chen zhugs la byams //
NK085(ru)006:450: zhes gsungs pas sngar bshad pa ltar spyi ring nye
NK085(ru)006:451: ba 'dres pa'i mched bzhi dang de las kyang brtan
NK085(ru)006:452: zhugs kyi mched phyi ma gsum dang /
NK085(ru)006:453: de'i nang nas 'dres pa'i mched lhag par gnyan par shes pa'i rim pas rtag tu mi 'bral zhing /
NK085(ru)006:454: phan 'dogs kyi brtse gdung la 'bad pas brtson pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:456: rdo rje spun la gdung sems kyang //
NK085(ru)006:458: yang dag lam du zhugs pa la //
NK085(ru)006:459: rngan dang bcas pa'i sems tsam yang //
NK085(ru)006:460: rtag tu spang bar bya ba yin //
NK085(ru)006:461: brtse zhing gdung ba'i shugs phyungs la //
NK085(ru)006:462: gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin bltas //
NK085(ru)006:463: mdor na srog la'ang mi chags par //
NK085(ru)006:464: spun dang ming sring dgos pa bsgrub //
NK085(ru)006:465: ci'i phyir rdo rje spun rnams ni //
NK085(ru)006:466: 'di nas byang chub bar dag tu //
NK085(ru)006:470: de yang mched kyi dam tshig sgo nga phyed gshag
NK085(ru)006:471: ces kha gtam du grags pa bzhin phan tshun gnyis
NK085(ru)006:472: kas mnyam par bsrungs dgos rgyu'i don gong gi lung
NK085(ru)006:474: 'on kyang gcig shos nas yal bar bor kyang rang
NK085(ru)006:475: nyid kyi ci nus bsrung byar rig pa nyid do
NK085(ru)006:476: rmong ba kha cig dam tshig sgo nga phyed gshag
NK085(ru)006:479: zhes bla ma la sbyar te smra ba ni don ma go ba'i 'chal gtam du zad do //
NK085(ru)006:480: bla mas slob ma la bsrung dgos pa yang /
NK085(ru)006:481: dam tshig gi rnam dbye lan gsum du spros te ma bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:482: 'on kyang gcig slob ma snying nas chos rtse gcig
NK085(ru)006:483: tu 'dod cing gdams ngag don du gnyer ba zhig
NK085(ru)006:484: la gdams pa dpe 'khyud kyi sgo nas mi ston
NK085(ru)006:485: cing de'i blo kha chos la 'jug pa de las
NK085(ru)006:486: bzlog ste sdig la sbyar ba /
NK085(ru)006:487: sngon dam 'gal byung ba bshags tshig las la 'das
NK085(ru)006:488: pa'i nang khongs su gzhung bzhin snying nas mthol te
NK085(ru)006:489: bshags pa ma blang ba gsum yod ces bdag gi
NK085(ru)006:490: rje bla ma thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs par thos
NK085(ru)006:491: / gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya /
NK085(ru)006:492: zhes pas gsang ba mi smra bar bstan zhing /
NK085(ru)006:495: spyi dang bar gsang bzhi bzhi dang //
NK085(ru)006:496: 'os dang gter gtad rnam pa bcu //
NK085(ru)006:498: de'i dang po spyir gsang bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)006:500: lta zab spyod pa barlanga po dang //
NK085(ru)006:501: lha ming gzungs dang grub rtags rnams //
NK085(ru)006:502: spyir gsang rnam pa bzhi yin no //
NK085(ru)006:504: lta ba zab mo chos nyid don dam pa'i gnas lugs dang /
NK085(ru)006:505: spyod pa ni barlanga spyod te /
NK085(ru)006:506: de yang 'jig rten na spyad byar ma gyur pa
NK085(ru)006:507: zhig la spyod pa de la barlanga po zhes bya
NK085(ru)006:508: zhing / de ji ltar na ta na ga na
NK085(ru)006:509: ste sbyor dang sgrol ba gnyis yin la de spyad
NK085(ru)006:510: pa'i nus pa rnyed kyang gsang ste spyod dgos pa
NK085(ru)006:511: zhing / dang / lha ming ni rang nyid yi
NK085(ru)006:512: dam lhag pa'i lha la gang byed pa de'i mtshan
NK085(ru)006:513: zhing / dang / dang / de'i gzungs sngags dang /
NK085(ru)006:514: de grub pa'i rtag mtshan rnams so //
NK085(ru)006:515: de yang dgongs don khyad par can mthong na ma
NK085(ru)006:516: gtogs spyir nam yang gsang dgos pas na spyir gsang
NK085(ru)006:517: zhes bya'o // bar gsang bzhi ni de las /
NK085(ru)006:518: sgrub pa'i gnas dus grogs dang rdzas //
NK085(ru)006:519: bar du gsang la bsgrub par bya //
NK085(ru)006:522: nam gyi tshe bsgrub pa'i dus /
NK085(ru)006:524: ji ltar mkho ba'i sgrub rdzas rnams bsgrub pa nam grol dang /
NK085(ru)006:525: gsang ba'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i bar de srid
NK085(ru)006:526: du skabs don dpag pa'i sgo nas gsang dgos pa'i
NK085(ru)006:527: don gyis na bar gsang zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:529: phud dang gtor ma sogs gsang sngags kyi thun mong ma yin pa dam rdzas kyi yo byad dang /
NK085(ru)006:530: bla ma'i mdzad spyod gdul bya ma dag pa'i blo mi shongs pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)006:531: mched kyi ngan spyod sogs mthong thos su mi rung ba rnams so //
NK085(ru)006:533: bla ma dang mched lcam gyi 'di nyid gzhan la
NK085(ru)006:534: ma ston nam ma smra zhes gsang tshig gi gnyer
NK085(ru)006:537: gsang bar 'os pa'i dam tshig ni //
NK085(ru)006:538: phung dang gtor ma tshogs dag dang //
NK085(ru)006:539: b+han+d+ha phur pa mar me'i snod //
NK085(ru)006:540: rdzas dang lag cha dkyil 'khor rnams //
NK085(ru)006:541: skye bos mthong bas yongs mi bya //
NK085(ru)006:542: dril bu rnga chung la sogs sgra //
NK085(ru)006:543: skye bos thos par yongs mi rung //
NK085(ru)006:544: grogs kyi skyon dang mtshangs rnams dang //
NK085(ru)006:545: sems can kun gyis ngan spyod kyi //
NK085(ru)006:546: kun la gnod pa'i spyod pa rnams //
NK085(ru)006:547: shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu //
NK085(ru)006:548: gnyer gtad pa ni gdams pa ste //
NK085(ru)006:549: sngar bshad slob dpon mched kyi so //
NK085(ru)006:552: gzhan yang slob dpon mched lcam gyis //
NK085(ru)006:553: gsang bar bsgrags dang gnas skabs su //
NK085(ru)006:554: de ltar 'os pa shin tu gsang //
NK085(ru)006:556: de nyid gsang ba'i yul ni /
NK085(ru)006:558: dam nyams dam las log pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:559: dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong dang //
NK085(ru)006:563: snod ma yin pa'i gang zag la //
NK085(ru)006:564: dus dang gnas skabs kun tu gsang //
NK085(ru)006:565: snod dang ldan pa rnams la yang //
NK085(ru)006:566: dbang ma thob par bshad pa min //
NK085(ru)006:568: lta spyod ni nyan thos sogs theg pa 'og ma
NK085(ru)006:569: pa rnams dang so so'i skye bo log srid can
NK085(ru)006:570: sogs snod ma smin pa'i gang zag rnams la ste
NK085(ru)006:571: / de dag gi blor mi shong zhing log rtog gi skyon 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:572: lha ming gzungs sngags grub rtags sogs ngom chos 'phyar g.yems kyi smra bar mi bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:573: gsang sgrog gi nyes pas 'dod 'bras las ring zhing
NK085(ru)006:574: ngan song gi rgyu 'grub pa'i phyir bla ma dang
NK085(ru)006:575: dam gtsang gi mched ma gtogs gzhan la mi smra
NK085(ru)006:576: ba'o // de yang ma 'dres pa la bstan nas dam tshig nyams la /
NK085(ru)006:577: 'dres pa la'ang rang gar bstan na dngos grub nyams pa'i don gyis shin tu gsang dgos te /
NK085(ru)006:579: gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te //
NK085(ru)006:580: sems can don phyir rab tu gsang //
NK085(ru)006:581: gsang thub dngos grub mi yal bas //
NK085(ru)006:582: gsang phyir brda dag sna tshogs gsungs //
NK085(ru)006:586: sems kyi bstan par mi bsam zhing //
NK085(ru)006:587: lus kyi thams cad sbas la spyad //
NK085(ru)006:588: ngag gi rdo rje'i lce yod kyang //
NK085(ru)006:589: brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
NK085(ru)006:590: zhes yul dus kyi dmig phyed pas gsang tshul shiin tu dam par bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:591: 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te /
NK085(ru)006:592: zhes pas lnga po 'di ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:593: dper na ljon shing gi rtsa ba rul na yal
NK085(ru)006:594: ga lo ma sogs yan lag gzhan rnams yod kyang
NK085(ru)006:595: snying po stong pas phan mi thog pa bzhin rtsa
NK085(ru)006:596: ba 'di lnga gang rung dang 'gal phyin chad so
NK085(ru)006:597: byang sngags kyi bsrung bya phra mo gzhan rnams ma
NK085(ru)006:598: nyams kyang 'dod 'bras 'grub pa lta zhog /ngan song
NK085(ru)006:599: gi gnas mthar thug la 'god pa'i phyir te de
NK085(ru)006:600: skad bya ste / kho bo'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen pos bla sgrub tu /
NK085(ru)006:601: rtsa ba'i dam tshig sdong po me 'bras 'dra /
NK085(ru)006:602: de nyams thar pa'i sa bon nges par tshig /ces gsungs so //
NK085(ru)006:603: bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /ces pa 'di la bzhed tshul mi mthun pa gnyis te /
NK085(ru)006:604: rong zom pa chen po dang zur lugs kyi bka' srol 'chad pa po rnams /
NK085(ru)006:605: bla med mi spong ba dang sngags rgya rgyun mi
NK085(ru)006:606: bcad pa gnyis yon tan khyad par can bsgrub pa'i
NK085(ru)006:607: dam tshig dang / bla ma bkur zhing mched la byams pa gnyis thugs 'gal bsrung ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:608: gsang sgrog de'i grogs su srungs bya gtso che bas bsrung ba'i dam tshig tu bzhed /
NK085(ru)006:611: dngos grub kyi 'byung gnas bla ma bkur ba /
NK085(ru)006:612: sngags rgya rgyun mi bcad pa ni yon tan khyad par can sgrub pa'i dam tshig yin la /
NK085(ru)006:613: de'i yan lag tu yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs
NK085(ru)006:614: pa dang mched lcam la byams pa ni bla ma'i
NK085(ru)006:616: gsang ba gzhan la mi smra ba lha dang sngags
NK085(ru)006:617: dang phyag rgya'i de nyid dang 'gal ba bsrung ba
NK085(ru)006:618: ste bsrung ba'i dam tshig tu bzhed cing /
NK085(ru)006:620: sgrub pa'i dam tshig chen po ni //
NK085(ru)006:621: lha dang bla ma mi spang zhing //
NK085(ru)006:622: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)006:623: ces 'dren par mdzod cing gang ltar lnga po dam tshig kun gyi mchog tu gsang sngags pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:624: de dag sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig /gsum gsum
NK085(ru)006:625: du gyur te dper na bla med mi spang ba
NK085(ru)006:628: yid kyis gus par bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:629: tshul des bla ma dang mched la'ang sgo gsum gus pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:630: sngags rgya'i dam tshig yang sgo gsum tshang ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:631: gsang ba yang sgo gsum gyi bya bas gsang zhing
NK085(ru)006:632: sbed pa sogs kun las rigs 'gre ba'i phyir ro
NK085(ru)006:634: bla ma dang mched la bsrung ba ni phan 'dogs
NK085(ru)006:635: zhing gnod pa spang ba'i gzhi'i gtso bo lus yin
NK085(ru)006:638: bla ma nyid dang lhan grogs la //
NK085(ru)006:639: lus ngag yid kyi bkur ba ni //
NK085(ru)006:640: rdo rje sku yi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)006:642: sngags rgya rgyun mi bcad pa ni bzlas brjod kyi
NK085(ru)006:643: yan lag tu gtogs pas ngag gtso bor yin pa'i
NK085(ru)006:644: phyir gsung gi dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)006:646: rang gi yid dam lha mchog gi //
NK085(ru)006:647: sngags dang phyag rgya rab 'dzin pas //
NK085(ru)006:648: dus kun tu ni rgyun mi gcod //
NK085(ru)006:649: rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig yin //
NK085(ru)006:651: gsang bcu ni zur pa'i bshad srol 'dzin pa rnams
NK085(ru)006:652: mi smra ba ngag yin kyang gang gsang ba ni
NK085(ru)006:653: thugs la gnas pas gtso bo sems kyi chos nyid
NK085(ru)006:654: yin zhes thugs su bsdu na'ang /
NK085(ru)006:656: gsang bar bya ba 'di rnams ni //
NK085(ru)006:657: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)006:658: zhes gsum kas bsdus par gsungs shing /
NK085(ru)006:659: bla med mi spang ba ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)006:661: byang chub sems gsum bsgom pa ni //
NK085(ru)006:662: rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)006:665: kha cig bla ma dang mched lcam la gus pa
NK085(ru)006:666: ni gzhi ma lus kyi bya ba yin pas sku'i
NK085(ru)006:667: dam tshig /lha mi spang zhing sngags dang phyag rgya
NK085(ru)006:668: rgyun mi bcad pa ni bzlas brjod kyi yan lag
NK085(ru)006:669: ste gsung gi dam tshig /gsang ba mi smra ba
NK085(ru)006:670: ni yid la gnag par bya ba ste thugs kyi
NK085(ru)006:671: dam tshig go zer ba de yang rig ma mthong
NK085(ru)006:672: ste 'don pa bsgyur na mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:675: 'dir byang sems dang gsang ba mi smra ba gnyis thugs kyi dam tshig tu bsdus na bde ste /
NK085(ru)006:676: rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum du bsdu ba'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:678: 'di dang mthun par dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i
NK085(ru)006:679: rgyud kyi dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i bshags
NK085(ru)006:680: pa'i le'u / gsang bcu la sogs man ngag rab ster dang /
NK085(ru)006:681: zhes thugs kyi dam tshig tu bsdus par bshad cing /
NK085(ru)006:682: kho bo ni gong du grangs pa'i bder 'dus zhi
NK085(ru)006:683: rgyud kyi lung ltar gsang bcu ni sku gsung thugs
NK085(ru)006:684: gsum kas bsdus pa nyid 'thad dam snyam /
NK085(ru)006:685: gnyis pa yan lag gi dam tshig bcu bshad pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)006:690: de dag dug lnga log dug lnga /
NK085(ru)006:691: zhes yang log gnyis su gsungs shing /
NK085(ru)006:692: de yang log pa'i dug lnga ni dug lnga rang mtshan pa rnams yin la /
NK085(ru)006:693: de nyid nyan thos lung bzhin dgrar bltas te mi spang zhing /
NK085(ru)006:694: ci'i phyir zhe na chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo stong pas spang bya'i rdzas ma grub ste /
NK085(ru)006:695: smig rgyu'i chu la rags mi dgos pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)006:696: de yang ji skad du rdo rje las /
NK085(ru)006:697: nyon mongs rnams ni sgyu 'dra ngo bos stong //
NK085(ru)006:698: rang gi mi rtag rang bzhin shes pas grol //
NK085(ru)006:700: der ma zad thabs kyis zin na spyad kyang mi
NK085(ru)006:701: 'ching zhing lam gyi grogs su 'gyur pas yang mi
NK085(ru)006:703: nyon mongs lam ni dag pa che //
NK085(ru)006:704: thabs kyi 'dod yon rgyan gyi mchog /thams cad thams cad rol ba yis //
NK085(ru)006:705: myur du he ru ka dpal 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:707: tshul 'di dang mthun par mdo sde las kyang gsungs pa yod de /
NK085(ru)006:709: ji ltar grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud //
NK085(ru)006:710: de ni bu ram shing pa'i zhing la phan //
NK085(ru)006:711: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i mi gtsang lud //
NK085(ru)006:712: de ni rgyal ba'i chos kyi zhing la phan //
NK085(ru)006:715: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
NK085(ru)006:716: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:718: rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pas kyang ma spangs te /
NK085(ru)006:719: dam tshig nyer brgyad pa las /
NK085(ru)006:720: phrag dog la sogs nyon mongs rnams lnga ni //
NK085(ru)006:721: ye nas rig lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)006:724: gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang //
NK085(ru)006:725: 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni //
NK085(ru)006:726: bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa can //
NK085(ru)006:727: de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin //
NK085(ru)006:728: zhes pa'i 'grel par slob dpon chen po pad+mas /
NK085(ru)006:729: gti mug gi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)006:730: ci'i phyir zhe na ma rig pa ni spang du med /
NK085(ru)006:731: rig pa ni sgrub tu med de /
NK085(ru)006:732: chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:735: rang bzhin shes pas mi spang ste //
NK085(ru)006:736: rang rig ye shes nyid yin no //
NK085(ru)006:738: sbas don du yang dag dug lnga zhes bshad de /
NK085(ru)006:739: de yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs
NK085(ru)006:740: pas lta ba la phyogs ris dang spyod pa la
NK085(ru)006:741: blang dor gyi 'byed pa med pa'i gti mug /de
NK085(ru)006:742: ltar ma rtogs pa la dmigs pa med pa'i snying
NK085(ru)006:743: rje chen po nas rjes su chags pa'i 'dod chags
NK085(ru)006:744: / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi log rtog 'joms pa'i zhe sdang /
NK085(ru)006:745: nyams nyid rtogs pa'i lta ba shongs su mi 'bebs pa'i nga rgyal /
NK085(ru)006:746: gnyis 'dzin gyi lta spyod mnyam nyid kyi klong du mi shong ba'i phrag dog rnams te /
NK085(ru)006:747: de nyid rtogs goms thabs kyi byed rtsol gyis mi spang pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:748: gnyis pa mi 'dor ba lnga ni /
NK085(ru)006:750: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen /
NK085(ru)006:751: dag pa'i snod chu ni dri chu ste lnga po
NK085(ru)006:752: ye nas bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin yin pas na
NK085(ru)006:753: mi dor te / le lag las /
NK085(ru)006:754: bdud rtsi ye nas dag pa'i chos //
NK085(ru)006:755: blang dor med pa kun las 'das //
NK085(ru)006:756: ye bsrung chen po'i dam tshig tu //
NK085(ru)006:757: mkhas pas dang du blang bar bya //
NK085(ru)006:759: rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pas kyang mi dor te /
NK085(ru)006:760: de yang byang sems ni rdo rje rigs /
NK085(ru)006:761: me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK085(ru)006:762: dri chen de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chos dbyings ye shes /
NK085(ru)006:763: sha chen ni rin chen rigs /
NK085(ru)006:767: dri chu ni las kyi rigs /
NK085(ru)006:770: bdud rtsi lnga ni rigs lnga'i dngos //
NK085(ru)006:771: dri chen dri chu byang chub sems //
NK085(ru)006:773: gzhan yang nad lnga sel zhing rang bzhin gyi mthu lnga yod pa'i phyir yang mi spang ste /
NK085(ru)006:774: byang sems kyi tshad pa'i nad rnams sel zhing mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:775: de bzhin du rak+tasa grang ba'i nad sel bkrag mdangs gsal ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:776: dri chu'i dug nad sel tshe ring ba dang //
NK085(ru)006:777: gtsang rmi'i rtogs pa sbyangs phyir dang //
NK085(ru)006:778: thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang //
NK085(ru)006:779: rigs lnga 'grub pa'i yon tan dang //
NK085(ru)006:780: sdug ba sngal las grol dngos grub thob //
NK085(ru)006:782: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las /
NK085(ru)006:783: mi bskyod rten pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK085(ru)006:784: nad kun rnams par spang bar 'a gyur //
NK085(ru)006:785: rtag pa yis ni mdangs chen 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:787: dngos grub sgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas kyang blang ste /
NK085(ru)006:789: sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni //
NK085(ru)006:790: rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya //
NK085(ru)006:791: gshang gci'i dam tshig mchog gis ni //
NK085(ru)006:794: de dang mthun par sha lnga po yang bsten na
NK085(ru)006:795: mkha' 'gro 'du zhing dngos grub nye ba sogs kyi
NK085(ru)006:796: yon tan khyad par du mnga' ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:798: glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur /
NK085(ru)006:799: rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis //
NK085(ru)006:800: mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:801: khyi sha dag gis dam tshig pa //
NK085(ru)006:803: ba lang sha yi dam tshig gi //
NK085(ru)006:807: ba glang khyi dang rta sha dang //
NK085(ru)006:808: mi sha glang chen sha la sogs //
NK085(ru)006:809: zos na yon tan thams cad 'grub //
NK085(ru)006:810: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags //
NK085(ru)006:812: sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyang //
NK085(ru)006:813: brtul zhugs 'di lnga gtsor spyad nas //
NK085(ru)006:814: dam tshig dam pa bzung bas na //
NK085(ru)006:815: sngon gyi dam tshig yin par grags zhes pas brtul
NK085(ru)006:816: zhugs spyod pa'i grogs su gyur pas kyang dang du
NK085(ru)006:817: blang bar bya ba yin no //
NK085(ru)006:818: de dag la yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:819: rtsa ba'i grogs sam thabs su gyur ba'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:820: sngar 'gyur bla med kyi yang rtse man ngag sde'i dgongs don ltar na /
NK085(ru)006:821: dam tshig rnam par bkod pa las //
NK085(ru)006:822: 'gro ba'i smin so gsum dag las //
NK085(ru)006:823: sngags kyi dam tshig gsum du bshad //
NK085(ru)006:824: de la khyad par nges phye ba //
NK085(ru)006:825: sku dang gsung dang thugs dag las //
NK085(ru)006:826: re re la'ang dgu dgu ste //
NK085(ru)006:827: 'jug dang las kyi rnam pas shes //
NK085(ru)006:828: zhes rtsa ba sku gsung thugs gsum la phyi nang gsang gsum dang /
NK085(ru)006:829: de re re la'ang gsum gsum du phye bas nyi shu rtsa bdun du gsungs te /
NK085(ru)006:830: de yang dang po lus kyi bsrung bar bya ba
NK085(ru)006:831: sku'i dam tshig la phyi nang gsang ba gsum las
NK085(ru)006:832: / dang po phyi'i phyi nang gsang gsum ni /
NK085(ru)006:835: srog gcod gsum spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:836: rdo rje snying po khong bu brtsegs pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:837: sku yi phyi yi dam tshig las //
NK085(ru)006:838: rnam pa gsum du rab phye ste //
NK085(ru)006:839: ma byin blangs pa phyi yi yang //
NK085(ru)006:840: sku yi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:841: de yi rtags su yan lag ni //
NK085(ru)006:842: mi bzad sna tshogs lus la 'byung //
NK085(ru)006:843: mi tshangs spyad pa nang yin te //
NK085(ru)006:844: rtags su dbang po'i nad rnams so //
NK085(ru)006:845: srog bcad pa ni gsang ba ste //
NK085(ru)006:846: de yi rtags su don snod na //
NK085(ru)006:850: pha ma rdo rje spun sring dang rang lus la smod pa /
NK085(ru)006:851: chos dang gang zag la smod pa /
NK085(ru)006:852: rang lus la brdeg 'tshog dang bka' thub kyi brnyas shing gdung ba rnams spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:853: gser gyi khang bu brtsegs pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:854: nang gi phyi ni spun dang yang //
NK085(ru)006:855: gang gi pha dang ma nyid dang //
NK085(ru)006:856: rang gi lus la mi smad do //
NK085(ru)006:857: nang gi nang nyid spyi na yang //
NK085(ru)006:858: theg pa che chung chos rnams la //
NK085(ru)006:860: zhugs te gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i lus //
NK085(ru)006:861: rmad cing mtho btsams rgyan smad na //
NK085(ru)006:862: sangs rgyas sku ni brgya phrag bslus //
NK085(ru)006:863: nang gi gsang ba rang gi lus //
NK085(ru)006:864: lha yi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)006:865: smad dang zas la dug 'dres zos //
NK085(ru)006:866: gal te mtshon gyis btab na yang //
NK085(ru)006:867: zag pa'i lam med lus brgya blangs //
NK085(ru)006:868: de 'og tsha ba'i dmyal ba myong //
NK085(ru)006:871: rdo rje spun sring gi lus la brdeg par gzas shing rgyan la smod pa /
NK085(ru)006:872: rdo rje mched lcam la brdeg pa dang bla ma'i yum la gces pa /
NK085(ru)006:873: bla ma'i grib mar 'gongs pa dang spyan sngar lus
NK085(ru)006:874: ngag gi spyod pa bag med rnams spang ba ste
NK085(ru)006:875: / dpal nyi zla brtsegs pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:876: rdo rje spun nam sring mo yi //
NK085(ru)006:877: lus kyi rgyan la dpyas pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:878: mtho btsams lag gis brdeg pa'i tshul //
NK085(ru)006:879: gal te gzhan gyi byed bcud na //
NK085(ru)006:881: nang gi shin tu 'dres pa'i mched //
NK085(ru)006:882: ku re rtsed mo'i tshul tsam du'ang //
NK085(ru)006:883: brdeg gam brdeg par btsams pa'am //
NK085(ru)006:884: rmi lam na'ang yum la btses //
NK085(ru)006:885: de ma thag tu ma bshags na //
NK085(ru)006:886: 'di yang sngar dang sdig mnyam mo //
NK085(ru)006:887: gsang ba'i gsang ba bla ma yi //
NK085(ru)006:888: sku yi grib mar mi 'gong la //
NK085(ru)006:889: bla ma'i spyan lam dag tu yang //
NK085(ru)006:890: mtshon cha bzung bar mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:891: rkang lag brkyang dang nyal mi bya //
NK085(ru)006:892: skyil krung 'dug dang rgyab mi bstan //
NK085(ru)006:893: lham dang stan dang bzhon pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:894: gdug sogs sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams spang //
NK085(ru)006:895: bla ma'i gzims khang dag la yang //
NK085(ru)006:896: lag pas mtshon nam rdo dag gi //
NK085(ru)006:897: bcom par bya ba ma yin no //
NK085(ru)006:899: bla ma'i gnas khang bshig pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:900: sku la btsams pa'i sdig byas pas //
NK085(ru)006:901: 'di yi sdig pa pha mtha' yas //
NK085(ru)006:902: gal te bla mar bag med pas //
NK085(ru)006:903: ma dpyad bsdongs na'ang pha mtha' yas //
NK085(ru)006:904: mchog tu sku la brnyas byas na //
NK085(ru)006:905: 'di yi rnam smin brjod mi long //
NK085(ru)006:907: gnyis pa gsung gi dam tshig yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum las /
NK085(ru)006:910: gzhan gyi zhor 'debs kyi tshig smra ba rnams spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:911: 'khor rnam par brtsegs pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:912: sngags kyi mos pa spyod pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:913: 'gro ba phal pa dag la yang //
NK085(ru)006:914: brdzun pa'i tshig ni rang 'dod kyi //
NK085(ru)006:915: smra la rtag tu dga' ba la //
NK085(ru)006:916: sngags bzlas nus pa mi 'byung zhing //
NK085(ru)006:917: gzhan la smras pa btsun pa min //
NK085(ru)006:918: rang gi ngag nyid nyams pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:920: ma 'ongs dus na me sha'i lus //
NK085(ru)006:921: byang gi phyogs su myong bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:922: de 'og ngan song sdug bsngal yang //
NK085(ru)006:923: rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:925: sngags la zhugs pa'i gang zag gang //
NK085(ru)006:926: gzhan gnyis dbyer 'jug phra ma sgra //
NK085(ru)006:928: ci byas log par 'gyur ba dang //
NK085(ru)006:929: ma dpyad pa rnams dgra 'gyur dang //
NK085(ru)006:930: lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:931: shi 'phos nas ni sder can lus //
NK085(ru)006:932: de nas ngan song rim gyis myong //
NK085(ru)006:934: rtag tu zhe gcod tshig smra ba //
NK085(ru)006:935: snga ma'i las dang phyi ma'i rtags //
NK085(ru)006:936: 'gro ba byams bral bshes kyang ldang //
NK085(ru)006:938: shi 'phos rab tu dregs pa'i lus //
NK085(ru)006:939: de nas ngan song gsum du 'khor //
NK085(ru)006:944: gnas lugs sgom par byed pa rnams la gshe skur 'debs pa rnam spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:945: dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud las //
NK085(ru)006:946: sngags pa sdom la gnas pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:947: chos smra rnams dang chos sgrub dang //
NK085(ru)006:948: chos ni bsgom pa'i gang zag la //
NK085(ru)006:949: sgro zhing bskur pa btab pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:950: gshe zhing smod pa'i tshig smras na //
NK085(ru)006:951: gzhan gyi mos pa nyams pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:952: rang gi bdog pa nyams pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:953: rang gi chos rnams brjod ngas te //
NK085(ru)006:955: ngan song sdug bsngal tshad med myong //
NK085(ru)006:958: rdo rje spun sring gi tshig /bla ma'i phyag rgya
NK085(ru)006:959: dang nye 'khor gyi tshig /bla ma'i gsung rnams la
NK085(ru)006:960: brnyas shing gcog pa sogs spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:961: phyag rgya gnyis sbyor gyi rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:962: rdo rje'i mched dang lcam dral la //
NK085(ru)006:963: tshig gis smras dang ngag bcag na //
NK085(ru)006:964: bskal pa brgya phrag bye bar ni //
NK085(ru)006:965: khyad par ngan song gsum po yi //
NK085(ru)006:966: sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po nyid //
NK085(ru)006:967: gang zag de yis myong bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:968: snga mar byas dang da lta'i rtags //
NK085(ru)006:969: rim par myong bar 'gyur ba ni //
NK085(ru)006:970: snga mar byas pa tshe 'di la //
NK085(ru)006:971: bar nas tha mar myong ba la //
NK085(ru)006:972: yang snga tshe stod la byas te //
NK085(ru)006:973: skyes ma thag tu myong bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:974: 'di la byas pa'i las mtha' ni //
NK085(ru)006:975: tshe yi zhabs la ngag gi las //
NK085(ru)006:977: glo bur dag tu smra rgyun 'gag /bla ma'i bu dang chung ma dang //
NK085(ru)006:978: gang dag nye gnas dag kyang rung //
NK085(ru)006:979: bka' las 'das shing ngag bcag na //
NK085(ru)006:980: snga ma las ni nyis 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)006:981: yang na bla ma'i bye brag gis //
NK085(ru)006:982: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi //
NK085(ru)006:983: ngag 'das ngag tu smras pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:984: sgro skur 'dod tshig smras byas na //
NK085(ru)006:985: snga ma las ni stong phrag 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:986: rnam par smin pa mi bzad pa //
NK085(ru)006:987: rim pas bla ma'i khyad kyis yang //
NK085(ru)006:988: de ma thag tu myong bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:990: gsum pa thugs kyi dam tshig la'ang phyi nang gsang gsum las /
NK085(ru)006:992: gnod sems brnab sems log lta gsum spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:993: snying po'i don rnams par len pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:994: gang dag sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin //
NK085(ru)006:995: sems can gzhan nam rang yang rung //
NK085(ru)006:996: gnod par bya ba'i las 'chad na //
NK085(ru)006:997: 'di ni du ba can kyi lus //
NK085(ru)006:998: grang ba'i reg par ldan pa yi //
NK085(ru)006:999: lus ni stong phrag lnga blang nas //
NK085(ru)006:1000: grang ba'i dmyal bar nges par skye //
NK085(ru)006:1002: gnam lcags me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1003: gal te sems can phal pa la //
NK085(ru)006:1004: yul dur gnod pa'i sems skyed nas //
NK085(ru)006:1005: 'gro ba thun mong lus can ni //
NK085(ru)006:1006: brgya phrag gsum gyi srog bcad pa //
NK085(ru)006:1007: 'di yi sdig pa'i cha dang mnyam //
NK085(ru)006:1008: gal te brtan pa'i rtags 'dzin pa'i //
NK085(ru)006:1009: gzugs can rnams la log 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)006:1010: sngags la zhugs pas brgya phrag 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1011: rdo rje'i spun sring bdun phrag go //
NK085(ru)006:1012: brgyud pa'i bla ma brgya phrag go //
NK085(ru)006:1016: rang ngam gzhan gyi grub mtha' yi //
NK085(ru)006:1017: chos la smod pa log pa'i lam //
NK085(ru)006:1018: rtsa ba'i dam tshig las 'das na //
NK085(ru)006:1019: sa spyod me yi sdug bsngal las //
NK085(ru)006:1020: yun ring bar du gnas par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1021: rang ni grub mtha' log lta skyes //
NK085(ru)006:1022: dmyal ba nyid las thar skabs med //
NK085(ru)006:1025: spyod pa log pa bag med /
NK085(ru)006:1026: sgom pa log pa bying rgod dang gol sgrib /
NK085(ru)006:1027: lta ba log pa rtag chad mthar 'dzin rnams spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:1028: shel gyi khang bu brtsigs pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1029: lta dang sgom dang spyod pa log /
NK085(ru)006:1030: 'di ni lam log chen po ste //
NK085(ru)006:1031: sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal gang //
NK085(ru)006:1032: 'di yi sems la smin par nges //
NK085(ru)006:1035: nyin zhag thun re re bzhin lta sgom spyod gsum yid la ma byas pa /
NK085(ru)006:1036: yi dam gyi lha yid la ma byas pa /
NK085(ru)006:1037: bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang mched lcam la brtse gdung yid la ma byas pa spang ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:1039: su yi yid kyi las 'chal te //
NK085(ru)006:1040: yid la bya ba'i chos rnams las //
NK085(ru)006:1041: yid la ma byas nyams pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:1042: 'das dang zhig pa'i las kyi mtha' //mnar med sdug bsngal myong ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:1044: gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig lnga tshan lngar
NK085(ru)006:1045: dbye ba sogs mtha' yas pa zhig yod na'ang sngar
NK085(ru)006:1046: bshad pa rnams su dngos shugs gang byung gi sgo
NK085(ru)006:1047: nas 'dus shing yi ge'i lus su che bar zhib
NK085(ru)006:1048: par gzhan du rtog par bya'o //
NK085(ru)006:1050: gang spyod na sngags sdom gtong ba'i rigs dang /
NK085(ru)006:1051: mi gtong na'ang yan lag nyams par byed pa'i rigs
NK085(ru)006:1052: gnyis su 'dus shing de yang rang sems la skyon
NK085(ru)006:1053: med par gtsang mar byed pa ni dam tshig gtso
NK085(ru)006:1054: bo yin pas de la bslab ste /
NK085(ru)006:1055: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1056: dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba //
NK085(ru)006:1057: mdor na rang sems gtsang mar bsrung //
NK085(ru)006:1058: 'di ni dam tshig rmad po che //
NK085(ru)006:1059: sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan par mdzad //
NK085(ru)006:1060: ces gsungs shing tshangs pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK085(ru)006:1061: sems kyi skyon rnams rab shes na /
NK085(ru)006:1062: sems yod skyon rnams mi brten no //
NK085(ru)006:1063: sems la dran pa lod gnas na /
NK085(ru)006:1064: skyon med zhi ba'i gnas thob bo //
NK085(ru)006:1067: sems 'di bsrung bar ma byas na //
NK085(ru)006:1068: bslab pa srung bar yang mi nus //
NK085(ru)006:1070: sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa //
NK085(ru)006:1071: brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya //
NK085(ru)006:1075: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che //
NK085(ru)006:1076: zhes gsungs pa bzhin rang gi lus gnyug ma'i rtsa
NK085(ru)006:1077: rlung thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes dang bcas pa
NK085(ru)006:1078: gdod nas sku gsung thugs dbyer med ye shes rdo
NK085(ru)006:1079: rje'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa gang zhig thos bsam
NK085(ru)006:1080: sgom pa'i shes rab kyi sgro 'dogs chod cing mngon
NK085(ru)006:1081: gyur du rtogs par gyur na dam tshig thams cad
NK085(ru)006:1083: gnas lnga rig pa pan chen pad+ma dbang gi rgyal pos /
NK085(ru)006:1084: mdor na rang lus rdo rje gsum shes na //
NK085(ru)006:1085: sngags kyi dam tshig sa ya 'bum sde 'dus //
NK085(ru)006:1088: dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba //
NK085(ru)006:1089: gud na yod pa ma yin te //
NK085(ru)006:1090: rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin //
NK085(ru)006:1093: kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)006:1094: skye med nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas //
NK085(ru)006:1095: bsrung dang mi bsrung gnyis su med pa ste //
NK085(ru)006:1096: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
NK085(ru)006:1099: spyir mdo sngags thun mong nyes ltung 'byung ba'i sgo bzhir bshad pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1100: de yang 'dul ba bsdu ba las /
NK085(ru)006:1101: ltung ba'i rgyu yang rnam bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)006:1102: mi shes pa dang bag med dang /
NK085(ru)006:1103: nyon mongs mang dang ma gus pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1105: spang blang la slob par 'dod kyang ltung ba so so'i blang dor gyi mtshams mi shes pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1106: shes kyang bla ma dang nges 'doms pa'i bslab bya'i
NK085(ru)006:1107: gnas la yid mi bston zhing ma gus pas 'phrog
NK085(ru)006:1108: ste der 'jug par mi byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1109: spyir mos gus kyi blo yod kyang nyes dmigs kyi
NK085(ru)006:1110: gnas ma mthong pa'am mthong na'ang dran shes kyi gnyen
NK085(ru)006:1111: po mi brten pa bag med kyi dbang du shor
NK085(ru)006:1112: nas 'dzems bag las g.yel ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1113: 'dzem blo cung zad skyes kyang dug gsum shas che
NK085(ru)006:1114: bas sems nyon mongs pa'i dbang du thal bas nyon
NK085(ru)006:1115: mongs mang ba ste bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)006:1116: de'i steng du bsrung bya'i don yid la mi 'jog pa'i brjed ngas pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1117: blo rmongs pas dran du med pa'i dran pa mi
NK085(ru)006:1118: gsal ba gnyis bsnan pas dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu
NK085(ru)006:1121: mi shes pa dang bag med dang /
NK085(ru)006:1122: nyon mongs mang dang ma gus pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1123: zhes gsungs pa ltar spang blang la slob par 'dod
NK085(ru)006:1124: kyang ltung ba so so'i blang dor gyi mtshams mi
NK085(ru)006:1125: shes pa dang / shes kyang bla ma dang des
NK085(ru)006:1126: 'doms pa'i bslab bya'i gnas la yid mi ston zhing
NK085(ru)006:1127: ma gus pas 'phrog ste der 'jug par mi byed
NK085(ru)006:1128: shes pa dang / pa dang / spyir mos gus
NK085(ru)006:1129: kyi blo yod kyang nyes dmigs kyi gnas ma mthong
NK085(ru)006:1130: ba'am mthong na'ang dren shes kyi gnyen po mi brten
NK085(ru)006:1131: par bag med kyi dbang du shor nas 'dzems bag
NK085(ru)006:1133: 'dzem blo cung zad skyes kyang dug gsum shes che
NK085(ru)006:1134: bas sems nyon mongs mang pa'i dbang thal bas nyon
NK085(ru)006:1135: mongs mang ba ste bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)006:1136: de'i steng du bsrung bya'i don yid la mi 'jog pa'i brjed ngas pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1137: blo rmongs pas dran du med pa'i dran pa mi
NK085(ru)006:1138: gsal ba gnyis bsnan pas dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu
NK085(ru)006:1139: drug tu bzhed cing mkha' 'gro sdom pa'i rgyud las
NK085(ru)006:1140: / mi shes pa dang bag med dang //
NK085(ru)006:1141: nyon mongs mang dang ma gus dang //
NK085(ru)006:1142: brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba //
NK085(ru)006:1143: 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu //
NK085(ru)006:1145: de ltar ltung ba 'byung pa sgo de dang de
NK085(ru)006:1146: la ltos pa'i gnyen po brten pas bsrung bar bya
NK085(ru)006:1147: dgos shing / de yang ltung ba'i 'tshams spang len
NK085(ru)006:1148: mi shes pa'i gnyen por bslab bya rnams legs par
NK085(ru)006:1149: bslab pas blang dor shes par bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1150: ma gus pa'i gnyen por bla ma dang des 'doms
NK085(ru)006:1151: shing gzhung lugs las ston pa'i bslab bya tha dag
NK085(ru)006:1152: la blos brtag cing gzhig te phan yon la brod
NK085(ru)006:1153: pa sogs kyis gus pa bskyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1154: bag med kyi gnyen por dgra nyen che sar zon
NK085(ru)006:1155: byed pa bzhin nyes dmigs la 'jigs pa'i sgo nas
NK085(ru)006:1156: sems bsgrim ste rtag tu bag yod par bya ba
NK085(ru)006:1157: dang / nyon mongs kyi gnyen por bzod pa bsgom
NK085(ru)006:1158: pa sogs thang skyes de'i gnyen po de dag de
NK085(ru)006:1159: brten pa sogs kyi sbyangs shing kun kyang gzhi med
NK085(ru)006:1160: rtsa bral du la bzla ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1161: brjed ngas kyi gnyen por dran pa'i lcags kyis bskul
NK085(ru)006:1162: te gnang bkag gi rnam dbye nyin dang mtshan du
NK085(ru)006:1163: mi brjed cing yid la byed pas 'gal ba rnams
NK085(ru)006:1164: 'phral lar bshags sdom la brtson pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1165: dran pa mi gsal ba'i gnyen por dran shes kyi
NK085(ru)006:1166: bya ras rtogs shing dpyod pa'i blang dor la rgyun
NK085(ru)006:1167: du brtson pas dam tshig las 'das ma 'das brtags
NK085(ru)006:1168: pa sogs kyi sgo nas rang rang gi gnyen po
NK085(ru)006:1169: la brtson pas zhugs cing mdor na sgo gsum gyi
NK085(ru)006:1170: spyod pa tha dag dam tshig dang 'gal na spong
NK085(ru)006:1171: / mi 'gal na sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtag tu bsrungs sems la 'bad pa nyid kho na'o //
NK085(ru)006:1172: de yang dam tshig las nyams na bdag ngan no
NK085(ru)006:1173: snyam pa rang la brten nas rtsa ba dang yan
NK085(ru)006:1174: lag gi nyes ltung cung zad la'ang 'dzem pa ste
NK085(ru)006:1176: bla ma dang yi dam mkha' 'gro zag med mkhyen
NK085(ru)006:1177: pa'i spyan mnga' ba rnams lkogs gyur sgrib med du
NK085(ru)006:1179: skye bo rmongs pa dag gis kyang spyod lam gyi
NK085(ru)006:1180: tshul mthong thos dogs gsum la brten te khrel nas
NK085(ru)006:1181: smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro snyam pas gzhan la
NK085(ru)006:1182: brten nas bsrungs pa ste khrel yod pas nyams pa'i
NK085(ru)006:1184: bsrung ba'i phan yon la brod pa'i sgo nas srog
NK085(ru)006:1185: la bab kyang rtag tu dam tshig gi bsrung ba
NK085(ru)006:1186: la brtson par bya ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:1188: ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
NK085(ru)006:1189: srog ni yongs su btang kyang sla //
NK085(ru)006:1190: 'chi ba'i dus la babs kyang sla'i rtag tu dam tshig gi bsrung par bya /
NK085(ru)006:1192: rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las //
NK085(ru)006:1193: bdag gis nor ni btang la lus bsrung ngo //
NK085(ru)006:1194: nor dang lus kyang btang la srog bsrung ste //
NK085(ru)006:1195: nor dang lus dang de bzhin srog rnams kyang //
NK085(ru)006:1196: thams cad btang la 'dir ni chos ba srung ngo //
NK085(ru)006:1198: de yang spyir so thar gyi sdom pa ni phra zhib nas srung dka' ba'i khul dang /
NK085(ru)006:1200: de las kyang sngags sdom ni shin tu zor yangs
NK085(ru)006:1201: pa'i dbang du byed pa sngags sdom ston 'khor gyi
NK085(ru)006:1202: bla ma phal cher yang thugs la bzhed 'dra zhing
NK085(ru)006:1203: / rgyu mtshan gsang sngags kyi dbang bskur la ni zhu mkhan dang /
NK085(ru)006:1204: gnang mkhan gnyis kas har 'tshangs dang /
NK085(ru)006:1205: bskur ba gang rnyed byed pa zhig 'dug kyang 'di
NK085(ru)006:1206: dag ni theg pa gsum gyi gnad shin tu mgo
NK085(ru)006:1207: bar zad de / pan chen jo bo rjes /
NK085(ru)006:1208: bdag la so thar gyi sdom pa'i nyes ltung ni ye nas gos ma myong zhing /
NK085(ru)006:1209: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i nyes ltung ni rtsa
NK085(ru)006:1210: re tsam phog /de las kyang rig 'dzin sngags kyi
NK085(ru)006:1211: sdom pa'i nyes ltung ni ca re nya re tsam
NK085(ru)006:1212: phog /ces dang / rdor brag mchog sprul dam pa
NK085(ru)006:1213: rig 'dzin pad+ma 'phrin las kyi rnam thar zhal gsungs
NK085(ru)006:1215: pham lhag spang ltung nyes byas kyi rigs che bas
NK085(ru)006:1216: ma gos pa rang rgyud la legs par rtogs shing
NK085(ru)006:1218: de yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin lta bu'i rlom sems med pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1219: de bas kyang theg chen byang chub sems dpa'i bslab
NK085(ru)006:1220: bya rnams dka' tshegs che bas nam mkha'i snying po'i
NK085(ru)006:1221: mdo dang sdom pa nyi shu pa sogs nas bshad
NK085(ru)006:1222: pa'i blang dor rnams la 'bad rtsol byed khul dang
NK085(ru)006:1223: / gtso bor rdo rje theg pa'i nyes ltung rnams
NK085(ru)006:1224: phra zhing zab pas dam tshig gi nyes ba char
NK085(ru)006:1225: ltar 'bab pa zhig 'dug pas 'phral mar bshags sdom
NK085(ru)006:1227: deng sang bum dbang gcig po'i mnyam rjes bka' baca'am
NK085(ru)006:1228: dam tshig tsam bsrung sdom yang mi nus na gzhan
NK085(ru)006:1229: rnams dgongs pa rtsa khrol gyi rang bzhin du 'dug
NK085(ru)006:1230: / 'on kyang la la dag 'dul ba kho na dka' ba'i khul dang /
NK085(ru)006:1231: byang sdom dang gsang sngags gnyis la mchong rgyang gnang mkhan rang mang bar 'dug pas /
NK085(ru)006:1233: gsang sngags zab mo'i las skal rnams mi byed zas
NK085(ru)006:1234: skal rnams za zhes gsungs pa rdo rje'i gsung kho
NK085(ru)006:1236: las skal ci yin na thog mar dbang bzhi'i dam
NK085(ru)006:1237: tshig nas bzung gsar rnying rang rang gi gzhung ltar
NK085(ru)006:1239: srungs sems kyi rnam rtog tsam yang mi 'dug pas las skal rnams mi byed gsungs pa de yin /
NK085(ru)006:1240: zas skal tshogs 'khor gyi mtshon bcas ldan dge slong yang sngags ma gus mi gus /
NK085(ru)006:1241: dam tshig gi rdzas yin min /
NK085(ru)006:1242: longs ma spyad pa'i nyes dmigs /
NK085(ru)006:1243: spyod pa'i gnang bkag sogs ci bsam rgyu med par
NK085(ru)006:1244: tshogs 'khor yin na za dgos pas khyab par lta
NK085(ru)006:1245: bur snang / zhes dam pa'i gsungs de dag snying
NK085(ru)006:1246: la 'bab pas thal mo snying gar lan brgyar sbyor
NK085(ru)006:1247: bur snang / rig go // de'i rgyu mtshan yang /
NK085(ru)006:1248: gong du bshad pa'i dam tshig nyer bdun po'i nang du so thar gyi spong bdun dag bshad cing /
NK085(ru)006:1249: lhag rnams sngags sdom gyi khyad chos su gsungs pas
NK085(ru)006:1250: sngags sdom bsrung sla zhing gu yangs bar 'gro e
NK085(ru)006:1251: 'dug rnams dpyod kyi spyan rgyang mthon pos gsung rab
NK085(ru)006:1252: mtha' dag gi don la thugs rtogs legs par bcug
NK085(ru)006:1253: ste de dang rjes mthun gyi spang len rang gi
NK085(ru)006:1254: spyod pa dang / gzhan la don de dag chu
NK085(ru)006:1255: shing gi 'bras bu bzhin bstan don du 'gyur pa
NK085(ru)006:1256: spyod pa dang / zhig dka' na'ang / smra mkhan
NK085(ru)006:1257: bdag lta bu'i ris can gyi 'di ltar du smras
NK085(ru)006:1258: kyang che phra mang po'i thugs dang 'gal bas rang
NK085(ru)006:1259: nyid kun gyi khyu ru mi tshud pa'i rgyur mthong
NK085(ru)006:1260: spyod pa dang / zhig dka' na'ang / ste / kun mkhyen dam pa bu ston gyis //
NK085(ru)006:1261: mang du smras na dgra ru sdang //
NK085(ru)006:1262: ma smras lag len 'chol par spyod //
NK085(ru)006:1263: ces gsungs pa nyid kho na thugs bden par zad do //
NK085(ru)006:1264: lnga pa ma srung ba'i nyes dmigs la nyes dmigs spyir bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1266: lci yang gi tshad bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1267: dang po la spyir dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni brjod kyi mi langs ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:1268: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las //
NK085(ru)006:1269: dam tshig las ni 'das gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1270: 'di phyir bde legs nyams pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:1271: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs myong //
NK085(ru)006:1272: sa spyod me yi sdug bsngal la //
NK085(ru)006:1273: bskal pa bye ba grangs med gnas //
NK085(ru)006:1276: gal te nyams par gyur pa na //
NK085(ru)006:1277: chad pa'i skye gnas bskal chen brgyad //
NK085(ru)006:1278: mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po yis //
NK085(ru)006:1282: ma gsangs sbrul dang chom rkun dang //
NK085(ru)006:1283: sa spyod me yi sdug bsngal bskyed //
NK085(ru)006:1286: yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang //
NK085(ru)006:1287: rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug dang //
NK085(ru)006:1288: chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:1289: gdon dang log 'dren nyams kyis kyang //
NK085(ru)006:1290: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung //
NK085(ru)006:1292: gnyis pa ni spyi mdo las /
NK085(ru)006:1293: lang nyid bdag po gang 'di las //
NK085(ru)006:1294: nyams par gyur pa gang zhe na //
NK085(ru)006:1295: kun tu nyams pa chen po dang //
NK085(ru)006:1296: rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams //
NK085(ru)006:1297: de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga //
NK085(ru)006:1298: zhes pa ltar nyams pa ni yul ches gnyen pa
NK085(ru)006:1299: la kun dkris drag pos spyad pa'i lan grangs du
NK085(ru)006:1300: mar byung ba dus 'das ral la sogs yin la
NK085(ru)006:1301: / rtsa nyams pa ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig las
NK085(ru)006:1302: nyams par gyur na tshe 'dir yang dbang sdud bsgrub
NK085(ru)006:1303: pas yul khams dgrar sdang ba bzhin sgrub pa thams
NK085(ru)006:1304: cad 'dod 'bras phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba sogs
NK085(ru)006:1305: mi 'dod pa tha dag char bzhin du 'bebs pa
NK085(ru)006:1306: / dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi dbugs dang bral
NK085(ru)006:1307: ma thag rdo rje dmyal ba'i skyes gnas su ltung
NK085(ru)006:1308: / dang / bar bshad de / gsang snying las /
NK085(ru)006:1309: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1310: bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1311: yid du mi 'ongs sna tshogs pa'i //
NK085(ru)006:1315: rtsa kun nyams pa'i 'chal pa dag /gsol nye bar
NK085(ru)006:1316: mi brtson pa rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste
NK085(ru)006:1317: / dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi //
NK085(ru)006:1318: sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdom pa ni //
NK085(ru)006:1319: de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod //
NK085(ru)006:1320: sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang //
NK085(ru)006:1321: byang chub sems dpa'i phrin las kun //
NK085(ru)006:1323: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su //
NK085(ru)006:1326: se gol gcig gis phyin par byed //
NK085(ru)006:1327: de bas shin tu nan tan gyis zhes dang /
NK085(ru)006:1329: gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na //
NK085(ru)006:1330: nyams pa bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1331: de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //
NK085(ru)006:1332: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
NK085(ru)006:1334: de yang tshig gi zur dang brda tsam gyi kyang brjod mi rung zhing /
NK085(ru)006:1335: rmi lam tsam du nyes pa byung kyang bshags dgos pa yang /
NK085(ru)006:1337: bla ma dang ni nye ba'i 'khor //
NK085(ru)006:1338: rdo rje spun dang sring mo la //
NK085(ru)006:1339: ngan smra tshig gi zur tsam yang //
NK085(ru)006:1340: brda'i dngos por brjod mi bya //
NK085(ru)006:1341: gal te rmi lam dag tu yang //
NK085(ru)006:1342: byung na yid kyi bshags par bya //
NK085(ru)006:1343: dngos dang zhe yi byas pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:1344: gal te dran pas ma zin par //
NK085(ru)006:1345: thal bar gyur kyang ma bshags na //
NK085(ru)006:1346: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
NK085(ru)006:1349: yan lag gi dam tshig nyams par gyur pas kyang
NK085(ru)006:1350: tshe 'dir dngos grub mi 'grub cing phyi ma ngan
NK085(ru)006:1353: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1354: 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung //
NK085(ru)006:1355: zhes pas gong gi rtsa ba nyams pa dang sdug
NK085(ru)006:1356: bsngal che chung dang mnar yun ring thung gi khyad
NK085(ru)006:1357: par che ba las gzhan 'dra bar yang /
NK085(ru)006:1358: rdo rje snying po rgyan las /
NK085(ru)006:1359: de las sngags pas yongs 'das na //
NK085(ru)006:1362: bsrid med spyi'u tshugs dmyal bar 'gro //
NK085(ru)006:1363: sbom po ltung byed nyes dmigs kyang //
NK085(ru)006:1364: de dang 'dra bar shes par bya //
NK085(ru)006:1366: bzlas nyams ni snyam pa dang 'grod pa'i nyes pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1368: rtsa ba nyams pa'i 'chab pa dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang //
NK085(ru)006:1369: skad cig yud tsam smra ba byed //
NK085(ru)006:1370: nyes gyur nyes pa brjod mi longs //
NK085(ru)006:1372: kun 'dus las ji ltar 'o ma rul pa dag /rul bas 'o ma kun rul ltar //
NK085(ru)006:1373: rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni //
NK085(ru)006:1374: rnal 'byor can kun ma rungs byed //
NK085(ru)006:1376: zhar nyams ni gzhan ci zer brtag pa'i gzhan gyi ngo gar thal ba'i nyes byas so //
NK085(ru)006:1378: ngo bo la ltos pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1381: slob dpon mtsho skyes kyi rnam thar bsdus pa las /
NK085(ru)006:1382: dngos grub thams cad gzhir gyur pa //
NK085(ru)006:1383: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go //
NK085(ru)006:1385: tshad ldan ltung bar bshad pa yin //
NK085(ru)006:1386: yan lag gtso bo dus 'das pa //
NK085(ru)006:1387: lci ba zhes ni bshad pa ste //
NK085(ru)006:1388: sbyor ba ma rdzogs sbom po'o //
NK085(ru)006:1389: yan lag phra ba nyes byas so //
NK085(ru)006:1391: ltung ba kun la gang la brten nas ltung ba 'byung ba'i gzhi dang /
NK085(ru)006:1392: yul de la der shes shing nyes spyod pa'i las
NK085(ru)006:1393: lam rdzogs par grub pa mthar thug te yan lag
NK085(ru)006:1394: bzhi ldan nam / yang rtsa ltung gi bshags pa'i skabs //
NK085(ru)006:1395: nyon mongs kun slong der shes ldan //
NK085(ru)006:1396: lus ngag sbyor bstan bar chad dang //
NK085(ru)006:1399: bdun po de'i ngo bo ji ltar zhe na /
NK085(ru)006:1400: yul rdo rje slob dpon sogs gang yin de la
NK085(ru)006:1401: snying nas khro zhing zhe sdang dang phrag dog sogs
NK085(ru)006:1402: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i bsam pa ma
NK085(ru)006:1403: rungs pa'i ngo bo ste 'di la kun dkris kyang
NK085(ru)006:1404: zer / yul de la der shes pas yul gzhan dang nor ba sogs ma yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1405: gnod pa'i sbyor ba de lus ngag yid gsum gang
NK085(ru)006:1406: gi sgo nas spyod kyang dngos su bkal bas grub
NK085(ru)006:1407: pa dang spyad pa'i bya ba des yul de la
NK085(ru)006:1408: bar chad du gyur pa'am nyin mtshan gyi drug cha'i
NK085(ru)006:1409: nang du gnyen pos ma sleb par thun tshod kyi
NK085(ru)006:1411: rang nyid gdon gyis barlama ste smyo ba sogs kyi
NK085(ru)006:1412: 'du shes 'khrul pa ma yin par zhe thag pa
NK085(ru)006:1413: nas bsam bzhin par spyad pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1414: de lta bur byas pa zin nas 'gyod pa ma skyes par des mgu ste yid tshim pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1415: bshags tshad rang rang gi dus las 'das pa ste
NK085(ru)006:1416: yan lag bdun po dngos gzhi gcig gi steng du
NK085(ru)006:1417: tshangs na shin tu lci bas sdom pa'i mthun phyogs
NK085(ru)006:1418: bcom zhing sngags sdom gtong bas pham pa zhes brjod
NK085(ru)006:1419: do // yang rtsa ltung gang rung gnyen po dang
NK085(ru)006:1420: spel nas skyes pa lta bu dngos gzhi rgyu tshogs
NK085(ru)006:1421: ma tshang zhing ma bshags par thun tshod 'das nas
NK085(ru)006:1422: ltung ba zhes brjod de pham pa'i 'og nas lci
NK085(ru)006:1423: ba'i ltung ba ste so thar gyi dge 'dun lhag
NK085(ru)006:1424: do // ma bzhin no // bsam sbyor dang po
NK085(ru)006:1425: gsum byas kyang de ma grub pas yan lag mi
NK085(ru)006:1426: tshangs pa ni sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)006:1427: yan lag gi ltung ba gzhan rnams ni stung byed
NK085(ru)006:1428: dang thun tshod las 'das par bshags na ltung ba
NK085(ru)006:1430: lus ngag gi rnam 'gyur tsam rtsed mo'i phyir byas
NK085(ru)006:1431: pa sogs kyi phyogs mthun gyis nyes pa phra mo
NK085(ru)006:1432: nyes byas dang / gal te rdo rje'i mched la
NK085(ru)006:1433: phan pa'i sems kyi khros pa lta bu ni ltung
NK085(ru)006:1434: ba'i gzugs brnyan te don la ltung med de /
NK085(ru)006:1435: pan chen pad+ma dbang rgyal gyis /
NK085(ru)006:1436: kun la yul bsam sbyor ba mthar thug gam //
NK085(ru)006:1437: kun slong nyon mongs gang 'gal der shes dang //
NK085(ru)006:1438: lus ngag sbyor byas dngos gzhi'i bar chod dang //
NK085(ru)006:1439: ma 'khrul spyad dang 'gyod med bshags tshad 'das //
NK085(ru)006:1440: pham pa zhes brjod dngos gzhi ma tshang na //
NK085(ru)006:1441: thun 'das ltung ba zhes brjod lhag ma ltar //
NK085(ru)006:1442: rim pas dman na sbom po ltung byed dang //
NK085(ru)006:1443: nyes byas ltung ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par bya //
NK085(ru)006:1448: phyi dro ste thun gsum dang /
NK085(ru)006:1451: tho ring ste thun gsum gyi drug cha'i nang du
NK085(ru)006:1452: 'gal nyams byung ma byung legs par brtags te spang
NK085(ru)006:1453: len la blo sgrims shing dpyad pas thun re re
NK085(ru)006:1454: de dag gang rung gcig gi nang du nyes pa
NK085(ru)006:1455: de byas nas thun de ga'i nang du bshags pa
NK085(ru)006:1456: g.yengs par gyur na thun tshod la 'das pa zhes
NK085(ru)006:1457: bya ba dang / nyin zhag phrug gcig gi bar chod na ngam las 'gal ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1458: zla ba gcig gis bar ma chod pa tshun chad ni nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1459: lo gcig tshun chad ni 'das pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1460: lo gnyis sam tshun chad ni ral ba zhes nyes
NK085(ru)006:1461: phyin rim bzhin du lci bar 'gyur zhing de dag
NK085(ru)006:1462: lo gsum tshun du snying thag pa'i sgo nas brtson
NK085(ru)006:1463: pa chen po nas bshags na gso bar rung ba
NK085(ru)006:1464: dang / lo gsum 'das phan chod ni nam yang gsor rung bar ma gsungs te /
NK085(ru)006:1465: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1466: spyi dang khyad par dam tshig las //
NK085(ru)006:1467: dus las khyad par nges phye bas //
NK085(ru)006:1468: dam las 'gal zhes nyes byas gang //
NK085(ru)006:1469: zhag gi bar ma chod par ni //
NK085(ru)006:1470: dmigs pa'i yul la bshags byas nas //
NK085(ru)006:1471: des ni sor yang chud pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1472: nyes zhes zla bar chod pa la //
NK085(ru)006:1473: 'gyod pa drag pos bshags pas so //
NK085(ru)006:1474: ngan la 'das pa lo dag gis //
NK085(ru)006:1475: bar du ma chod bshags pas so //
NK085(ru)006:1476: lo ni gnyis dang gsum dag las //
NK085(ru)006:1477: dam tshig ral ba zhes bya ste //
NK085(ru)006:1478: mchog tu rag na gso ru rung //
NK085(ru)006:1479: lo gsum dag las 'das pa ni //
NK085(ru)006:1480: de nas gso ru mi rung ste //
NK085(ru)006:1481: gal te blang na gnyis ka tshig /nges par sa spyod sdug bsngal la //
NK085(ru)006:1482: rgyun du spyod pa kho na'o //
NK085(ru)006:1484: gzhan yang nyes ltung lan grangs bcu gnyis par spyad
NK085(ru)006:1485: pa'i nyams pa chen po'i rigs ni gsor mi rung
NK085(ru)006:1488: rang lo 'das nas bshags pa'i yul /
NK085(ru)006:1489: rdo rje sems dpa' ma gnang ngo //
NK085(ru)006:1491: de dag spyad kyang nyes med du bstan pa yang /
NK085(ru)006:1492: rang nyid 'byung khams 'khrugs pas gdung ste na ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1493: rang dbang ma thob pa ste rang dbang nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1494: de nyid spyad na gzhan don du 'gyur che bar 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1495: don rlabs chen po'i rgyur mthong ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1496: skye ba med pa'i don brten pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1497: gzhan drangs ba sogs kyi dgos khyad dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1498: rtogs goms rmad du byung ba'i nus pa khyad par can rnyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1499: lhag pa'i lha lta bu yul khyad par can gyis gnang ba thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1500: bla ma bka' bsgo bas spyod cig pa'i lung nod pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1501: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba sogs las te /
NK085(ru)006:1503: na da nga dbang nyams bya ba dang //
NK085(ru)006:1504: gzhan gyi don dang don chen dang //
NK085(ru)006:1505: skyon med brtan pa dgos ldan dang //
NK085(ru)006:1506: nus pa nyid dang gnang ba dang //
NK085(ru)006:1507: bka' bsgo ba dang bar chad las //
NK085(ru)006:1508: nyes pa med par shes par bya //
NK085(ru)006:1510: drug pa bsrung ba'i phan yon ni //
NK085(ru)006:1511: spyi lo tog bskyed cing 'bras bu smin pa'i gzhi
NK085(ru)006:1512: rten sa gzhi yin pa ltar dam tshig ni dge
NK085(ru)006:1513: legs kyi yon tan tha dag skye ba dang gnas
NK085(ru)006:1514: pa'i gzhi rten du gyur pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1516: ji ltar sa gzhi gshin po las //
NK085(ru)006:1517: brten nas sa bon btab pa la //
NK085(ru)006:1518: 'bras bu smin par gyur pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:1520: chos rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur pa //
NK085(ru)006:1521: dam tshig 'di la gnas pa na //
NK085(ru)006:1522: bla med byang chub rnam smin pas //
NK085(ru)006:1525: khyad par gnas skabs su yid la bsam pa'i don rnams gegs med du 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1526: skye 'gro kun gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1527: 'jig rten gyi gtso bo lha chen po rnams kyi bkur gnas su 'gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1528: rgyal ba de sras dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams
NK085(ru)006:1529: kyis sras dang spun du dgongs nas rgyud byin gyis
NK085(ru)006:1530: brlabs pa dang / de'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK085(ru)006:1531: spyod yul la zhugs te rig pa 'dzin pa'i las
NK085(ru)006:1534: rgyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa de //
NK085(ru)006:1536: dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:1537: sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlabs //
NK085(ru)006:1538: bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs //
NK085(ru)006:1539: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NK085(ru)006:1542: gsang sngags rdo rje'i dam la gnas //
NK085(ru)006:1543: de yis smon pa kun 'grub cing //
NK085(ru)006:1544: lha rnams kyis kyang rtag tu bsrung //
NK085(ru)006:1545: rgyal ba rgyal mchog sras bcas kyis //
NK085(ru)006:1546: bu bzhin dgongs pa dam pa mdzad //
NK085(ru)006:1547: ting 'dzin yon tan dpag yas shing //
NK085(ru)006:1548: kun bzang rigs kyi dam pa 'grub //
NK085(ru)006:1550: gal te tshe 'dir lam rim pa gnyis la 'bad
NK085(ru)006:1551: par ma byas kyang rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:1552: la gnas na / de skye ba phyi ma'am /
NK085(ru)006:1554: ji ltar 'gor kyang skye ba bcu drug las mi
NK085(ru)006:1555: 'gyangs bar myang 'das kyi 'bras bu thob pa ste
NK085(ru)006:1557: dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na //
NK085(ru)006:1558: skye dang skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1559: de yi skye ba bdun la ni //
NK085(ru)006:1560: ma sgoms par yang dngos grub thob //
NK085(ru)006:1561: gal te dam tshig sdom la gnas //
NK085(ru)006:1563: skye ba gzhan du dngos grub thob //
NK085(ru)006:1565: pad+ma badz+ra gyis dam tshig lnga pa las /
NK085(ru)006:1566: gal te lhung ba med gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1567: skye ba bcu drug dag la 'grub //
NK085(ru)006:1570: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na //
NK085(ru)006:1571: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1573: bdun pa nyams na phyir bcos bya tshul la /
NK085(ru)006:1574: dbang bzhi'i dbye bas gos tshul dang dus 'das la ltos pa'i gos thabs /
NK085(ru)006:1575: gso thabs kyi rim pa gzhan ston pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1577: ji ltar bum dbang 'di nyid dus kyi 'khor lo'i byis 'jug gi dbang bdun po'i rnam dabye'o //
NK085(ru)006:1578: bdun tsam thob pas nyams na dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK085(ru)006:1579: grangs re re 'am gtso bo'i bzlas pa sum khri
NK085(ru)006:1580: drug stong ste stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bzlas
NK085(ru)006:1581: pa sbyangs shing / bum dbang thob pas ni de'i
NK085(ru)006:1582: steng du slob dpon gyis gsungs pa'i chad las kyi
NK085(ru)006:1584: sher dbang tshig dbang thob pas ni dben pa'i gnas
NK085(ru)006:1585: su mtshan bcas pa bskyed pa'i rim pa dang mtshan
NK085(ru)006:1586: med rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa 'ba' zhig gis
NK085(ru)006:1587: rang rgyud byin gyis brlabs pas sbyang ste /
NK085(ru)006:1588: de ltar sbyangs pas dag pa'i mtshan ma mthong na
NK085(ru)006:1589: slar dkyil 'khor du zhugs te sdom pa bzung zhing
NK085(ru)006:1590: dbang blang bar bya dgos pa yin la /
NK085(ru)006:1591: de'i tshe sngar dbang thob pa'i bslab gral dang rnyed
NK085(ru)006:1592: pa kun len pa sogs mi bya bar gsungs so
NK085(ru)006:1594: gong du bshad pa'i 'gal nyams 'das ral la ltos te bshags tshul tha dad par gsungs pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1598: nyams na rang gi bdog pas bskang //
NK085(ru)006:1599: 'das na bu dang chung ma dang //
NK085(ru)006:1600: nye 'khor lus dang ngag dag dang //
