NK085(ru)006:1601: yid dang bdog par bcas pas bskang //
NK085(ru)006:1602: ral na rang gi srog gis bskang //
NK085(ru)006:1603: zhes gsungs pa'i gzhan go sla la /
NK085(ru)006:1604: ral pa srog gis bskang pa ni /
NK085(ru)006:1605: bla ma dang sangs rgyas bstan gyi ched du rang
NK085(ru)006:1606: srog blos btang ba'i brtson pa drag pos bskang zhing
NK085(ru)006:1607: / gang ltar thams cad kyi rjes su tshogs 'khor
NK085(ru)006:1608: dang rjes su 'brel bar spyi bla ma'i spun las
NK085(ru)006:1609: nyams na gang las nyams pa de'i drung du'am de
NK085(ru)006:1610: dag med na sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du
NK085(ru)006:1611: gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyi bshags shing phyis sdom
NK085(ru)006:1612: pa'i brtul zhugs nyid la gnas par bya zhing /
NK085(ru)006:1613: khyad par bla ma la brten pa'i sdig pa ni
NK085(ru)006:1614: gzhan las 'bum 'gyur gyis lci bar bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)006:1615: / bzhugs na de nyid la nyin zhag gi bar ma chod par bshags /
NK085(ru)006:1616: mi bzhugs na sku 'bags la sogs pa'i drung du bshags sdom bya ba'o //
NK085(ru)006:1618: las dang rdzas dang 'dun pa dang //
NK085(ru)006:1619: ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do //
NK085(ru)006:1620: zhes bskang thabs lngar bshad pa'i las kyis bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)006:1621: sbyin bsreg dang bzlas brjod kyis te /
NK085(ru)006:1622: de yang kun tu nyams pa la khri phrag bcu gsum ste 'bum phrag gcig dang khri gsum /
NK085(ru)006:1623: rtsa ba nyams pa la khri phrag lnga dang stong phrag gsum /
NK085(ru)006:1624: yan lag nyams pa la stong phrag lnga dang brgya phrag gsum /
NK085(ru)006:1625: zlas nyams la brgya phrag lnga dang bcu phrag gsum /
NK085(ru)006:1626: zhal nyams la lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyis grangs kyi'o //
NK085(ru)006:1628: rigs lnga gang gis dam tshig gi khyad par la ltos te /
NK085(ru)006:1629: rnyed na dmang gdol so sor phye ba'i yul mi rigs lnga'i bla ma dngos dang /
NK085(ru)006:1630: ma rnyed na yid kyi mos pas de bzhin gshegs
NK085(ru)006:1631: pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam ste rdzas rin po
NK085(ru)006:1632: che lnga las rigs mthun pa'i dngos pos phongs sems
NK085(ru)006:1635: yid rab tu dwangs ba dang nyams chag byang zhing
NK085(ru)006:1636: dngos grub thob 'dod kyi dad pas nyes byas bsags
NK085(ru)006:1637: pa la gnong 'gyod kyi blos gdung shugs drag po'i
NK085(ru)006:1638: nga ros bshags par bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:1640: mi dge sdig pa'i bag chags rnams //
NK085(ru)006:1641: gdung ba'i glu dang bcas te bshags //
NK085(ru)006:1643: ting nge 'dzin gyi bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)006:1644: stobs bzhi tshangs pa'i sgo nas bshags pas bshags yul
NK085(ru)006:1645: gyi gnas gsum las dkar dmar mthing ba'i 'od zer
NK085(ru)006:1646: rang nyid la phog pas sdig sgrib nyams chag thams
NK085(ru)006:1648: de kho na nyid kyi bskang ba ni /
NK085(ru)006:1650: shes rab chen pos rgyud kyi bag chags thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1651: zhes pas sbyangs bya sdig pa /
NK085(ru)006:1653: byed po rang nyid sogs tha dag rmi lam sgyu
NK085(ru)006:1654: ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor gsum rnam par
NK085(ru)006:1655: mi rtog pa'i shes pa bsgom pa ni sdig sbyangs
NK085(ru)006:1656: rnams kyi nang na phul du byung ba ste /
NK085(ru)006:1659: rang sor 'dug la yang dag ltos //
NK085(ru)006:1660: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
NK085(ru)006:1663: khyad par rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig so so'i bskang thabs kyang bshad de /
NK085(ru)006:1665: dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na //
NK085(ru)006:1666: mgon btsun mnyam pa'i don rtogs na //
NK085(ru)006:1667: de nyid skang ba'i gnas su 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1668: bla ma spun la smad gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1669: tshe 'di nyid la mnyes byas te //
NK085(ru)006:1670: mthol bshags drag pos 'gyod byas na //
NK085(ru)006:1671: de ni skang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1672: gal te bdag gi bla ma spun //
NK085(ru)006:1673: ma bskang bar du tshe 'phos na //
NK085(ru)006:1674: de ni bskang ba'i tshad las 'das //
NK085(ru)006:1675: gsung gi tha tshig ral gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1676: rdo rje chos su bdag bsgoms te //
NK085(ru)006:1678: thugs kyi dam tshig ral gyur na //
NK085(ru)006:1679: rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgom na //
NK085(ru)006:1680: lo gsum bar du mi smra bar //
NK085(ru)006:1681: bsam gtan sbyor ba rab tu bya //
NK085(ru)006:1682: yan lag tha tshig ral gyur nas //
NK085(ru)006:1683: so sor rang rang rigs kyis bskang //
NK085(ru)006:1684: zhes rang gi sgo gsum gyi gzhi las sku gsung
NK085(ru)006:1685: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa bskang bar gsungs pa'o
NK085(ru)006:1687: rten gsum khyad par can nam sangs rgyas byang sems
NK085(ru)006:1688: bla ma sogs tshogs zhing yid kyi spyan drangs pa'i
NK085(ru)006:1689: mdun du sngar gyi nyams chag bshags shing phyin chad
NK085(ru)006:1690: srog la bab kyang mi 'gal ba'i sdom sems bya
NK085(ru)006:1691: ba dang / gtor tshogs sbyin sreg sogs rgyun gyis rnal 'byor la 'bad pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1692: sgo gsum g.yo zol med pas bla ma'i zhabs tog la 'bad pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1693: nyin dang mtshan gyi cha drug tu bdag 'jug gi dbang bzhi len pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1694: lus dang longs spyod dge tshogs kyi dngos po thams
NK085(ru)006:1695: cad dngos yid kyi sgo nas man+dala 'bul la bshags
NK085(ru)006:1696: pa dang / srog bslu dang nye'u 'don sbyin btang
NK085(ru)006:1697: sogs kyi dge rtsa ci 'grub la 'bad pa dang
NK085(ru)006:1698: pa dang / / mchod rten tshad ldan du bzhengs pa'i s+aats+tsha gdab pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1700: mdo rgyud zab mo la klog 'don bgyid pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1701: byams sogs tshad med bzhi bsgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1702: zhi ba'i sreg blug rgyas pa'i za byed rdo rje
NK085(ru)006:1703: mkha' 'gro'i sbyin bsreg la brtson pa'i mes sbyangs pa
NK085(ru)006:1704: dang / gzhan gyi yon tan brjod cing /
NK085(ru)006:1705: gang la nyes pa de la basngagasa pa phyogs bcur brjod cing yon tan bsam pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1706: de gang la dga' bas mnyes par bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1707: rten gsum byin can mang por phyag dang bskor ba la brtson pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1708: yid dam lhag pa'i lha'i gsang sngags bzla ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1709: 'bru gsum gyi bar du bla ma'i mtshan sngags bcug ste zla ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1710: zab mo'i bsam gtan zhi lhag gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1711: phung po gsum pa'i mdo nyin mtshan dus drug tu gdon pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1712: sgrib sbyangs kyi gzungs sngags byin can mang por kha thon la 'bad pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1713: khyad par spyi bor bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'
NK085(ru)006:1714: bsgom nas dmigs pa'i spro bsdus gsal bas yi ge
NK085(ru)006:1715: brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad re mi chags par bsgrangs
NK085(ru)006:1716: shing stobs bzhi'i yan lag tshangs ba bshags pa dang
NK085(ru)006:1717: / na rag dong sprug gi cho ga'i gzhung sam /
NK085(ru)006:1718: nyams chag bshags pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dri med
NK085(ru)006:1719: bshags pa'i rgyud la rgyun du kha ton 'bad pa
NK085(ru)006:1720: ni bshags pa'i nang nas mchog tu basngagasa pa ste
NK085(ru)006:1721: / bka' brgyad rang shar rtsa rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1722: 'di nyid dag par dus gcig la //
NK085(ru)006:1723: brgya rtsa brgyad brjod ma yengs na //
NK085(ru)006:1724: dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur //
NK085(ru)006:1727: gang gis sgyu 'khrul zhi khro yis /
NK085(ru)006:1729: nyams chag kun kyang byang gyur te //
NK085(ru)006:1730: mtshams med lnga yi sdig kyang byang //
NK085(ru)006:1731: na rag gnas kyang dong sprug te //
NK085(ru)006:1732: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK085(ru)006:1734: dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan thos pa
NK085(ru)006:1735: kyang nyams chag dag cing ngan song las thar ba
NK085(ru)006:1736: yang / dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)006:1737: dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)006:1738: pho mo rnams kyi thos pa tsam gyis rtsa ba
NK085(ru)006:1739: dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag thams cad
NK085(ru)006:1741: de'i phyir du pan chen pad+ma dbang gi rgyal pos /
NK085(ru)006:1742: glang chen rab 'bogs rgyud nas gsungs pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:1743: rnal 'byor spyi khrus 'gyod tshangs dong sprul gi //
NK085(ru)006:1744: bshags pas mi 'dag med phyir nyams su blangs //
NK085(ru)006:1746: gzhan yang tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1747: dngos grub bsgrub cing nyams chag thams cad bskang ba'i
NK085(ru)006:1748: phyir zla ba byung ngo cog gi nya dang gnam
NK085(ru)006:1753: 'di dag la phyi ru mkha' 'gro rnams rgyu zhing /
NK085(ru)006:1754: nang du rtsa rlung khyad par can 'du bas nye ba'i 'du ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1755: khyad par du yar ngo'i tshes bcu'i nyin mo dang /
NK085(ru)006:1756: mar ngo'i tshes bcu ste nyi shu lnga'i mtshan mo
NK085(ru)006:1757: bsgrub pa po'i gnas su mkha' 'gro grub pa can
NK085(ru)006:1758: 'du bas las gang yang 'grub pa'i phyir bsnyen sgrub
NK085(ru)006:1762: gsang ba byang chub sems kyi bskang bshags sogs tshogs mchod dang bskang bshags la 'bad par bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:1764: nya dang gnam stong tshes brgyad nyi shu dgu //
NK085(ru)006:1765: tshes bcu yar ngo mar ngo'i nyin dang mtshan //
NK085(ru)006:1766: bsnyen bsgrub tshogs mchod bskang bshags 'bad par bya //
NK085(ru)006:1768: des zla ba de'i ring la nyams pa thams cad sos pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1769: mchog thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad myur du 'grub par bshad do //
NK085(ru)006:1770: khyad par gong du bshad pa bzhin las dang po
NK085(ru)006:1771: pa rnams kyi bsgrub sla la phan yon che ba
NK085(ru)006:1772: yig brgya'i bzlas bsgom nyid gtso bor basngagasa te /
NK085(ru)006:1774: rang tha mal gyi spyi bos pad dkar zla ba'i
NK085(ru)006:1775: gdan la h+aum yig dkar po'i 'phro 'du yongs su
NK085(ru)006:1776: gyur pa las rtsa ba'i bla ma dang gnyis su
NK085(ru)006:1777: med pa'i bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
NK085(ru)006:1778: sku mdog ston zla ltar dkar zhing zhabs sems dpa'i
NK085(ru)006:1779: skyil krung can thugs kar zla dkyil la gnas pa'i
NK085(ru)006:1780: rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa'i lte bar sa
NK085(ru)006:1781: bon dang / de'i mthar yig brgya bklag thabs su 'khor bar dmigs shing /
NK085(ru)006:1782: sdig sgrib nyes ltung gi tshogs la 'gyod sdom drag
NK085(ru)006:1783: pos yig brgya sngags don dang mthun par gsol 'debs
NK085(ru)006:1784: kyi tshul du bzlas pas sku'i cha dang thugs ka'i
NK085(ru)006:1785: sa bon sngags 'phreng dang bcas pa las bdud rtsi'i
NK085(ru)006:1787: rang gi spyi bo nas zhugs lus thams cad sdig sgrib rnams dud sol gyi khu ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1788: nad rnams khrag rnag chu ser /
NK085(ru)006:1789: gdon rnams shig sro sbal sbrul sogs srog chags kyi
NK085(ru)006:1790: rnam par shel hrom chu'i brdas pa bzhin rtsa lam
NK085(ru)006:1791: chu lam ba spu'i khungs bu sogs nas thon par
NK085(ru)006:1792: bsam pa sdig sgrib bkru ba'i dmigs gnad dang sbyar
NK085(ru)006:1793: zhing / slar rang lus shel ltar dwangs pa'i rang
NK085(ru)006:1794: bzhin du gyur pa bdud rtsi'i them gyi gang bas
NK085(ru)006:1795: shel snod 'o mas gang ba ltar dmigs pa ste
NK085(ru)006:1796: dmigs pa'i rten 'brel gyi sgo kho nas kyang sdig
NK085(ru)006:1797: sgrib sbyangs ba la mchog tu basngagasa so //
NK085(ru)006:1798: mjug tu mgon po zhes gdung yus drag pos mtshan nas bos te /
NK085(ru)006:1799: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:1801: gnong tshig gis bshags mthar rdor sems 'od zhus rang
NK085(ru)006:1802: la bstim ste 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i ngang la
NK085(ru)006:1804: de yang sdig sgrib sbyang bar byed pa'i gnyen po ni mthol bshags te /
NK085(ru)006:1805: nyes pa la bsags pa gsang zhing sbas na /
NK085(ru)006:1806: sdig pa'i sa bon btab pa la g.yo rgyu'u chu lud 'dzom pa ste je 'phel nyid du 'gro /
NK085(ru)006:1807: skyon du mthong zhing ma sbed par bsgrag na cung
NK085(ru)006:1808: zhig stobs 'phra la nam yang 'phel bar mi 'gyur
NK085(ru)006:1809: zhing / de'i phyir bshags yul gyi spyan sngar ma gsang bar brjod pa ni mthol ba yin la /
NK085(ru)006:1810: las bsags pa de 'gyod sems drag pos skyon du khas blang ba bshags pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1811: rang nyid nyes skyon dang bcas pas gnong zhing ngo
NK085(ru)006:1812: tsha ba dor nas drang por smra ba'i sgo nas
NK085(ru)006:1813: dag tshangs mdzad par snying nas gsol ba ni bshags
NK085(ru)006:1815: de yang bshags pa thams cad la stobs bzhi tshangs dgos te /
NK085(ru)006:1816: chos bzhi bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK085(ru)006:1818: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig
NK085(ru)006:1819: pa byas shing bsags pa thams cad zil gyis gnon
NK085(ru)006:1820: par 'gyur ro // bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)006:1821: rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)006:1822: gnyen po kun tu spyod pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)006:1825: zhes gsungs pa'i don 'di yang tshangs pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:1826: rten gyi stobs ni gnyis las /
NK085(ru)006:1827: bshags yul gyi rten sangs rgyas kun 'dus bla ma rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK085(ru)006:1828: rang rgyud kyi rten skyabs sems dang /
NK085(ru)006:1829: rang gzhan gyi sdig sgrib dag par gsol ba sngags don rnams la tshangs /
NK085(ru)006:1830: gnyen po kun tu spyod pa'i stobs ni /
NK085(ru)006:1831: lha bsgom zhing sngags bzla ba dang sdig sgrib bkru ba'i dmigs pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)006:1833: dug khong du song ba ltar nyes byas la 'gyod pa drag po'i blo skyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1834: sor chud pa'i slar ldog pa'i stobs ni /
NK085(ru)006:1835: phyin chad srog la babs kyang mi bgyid par sdom pa'i sems so //
NK085(ru)006:1836: de yang gnong 'gyod med na bshags blo yang mi skye la /
NK085(ru)006:1837: 'gyod pa sha ma zhig skyes phyin chad sdom sems kyang shugs las 'byung ba yin no //
NK085(ru)006:1838: de ltar sdig sgrib dag pa'i rtags ma byung bar du bshags pa la 'bad par bya ste /
NK085(ru)006:1842: chu bo chen po brgal ba /
NK085(ru)006:1844: lus las rnag khrag zag pa /
NK085(ru)006:1845: 'bru skyugs byas pa sogs nyams lam du lan kha yar du byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1846: dngos su rig pa sngar las dngas shing dmigs pa gsal ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1848: dad dang nges 'byung snying rje sogs rtsol med du rgyud la skye ba dang /
NK085(ru)006:1849: le lo gnyid rmugs chags sdang sogs chung du song na sdig sgrib dag pa'i rtags mchog go //
NK085(ru)006:1850: de ltar bzlas la brtson pa'i yon tan yang bka'
NK085(ru)006:1851: brgyad rang shar gyi lung gong du drangs ba dang
NK085(ru)006:1852: / dri med bshags rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)006:1853: 'di dag dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyams chag thams cad bskong ste /
NK085(ru)006:1854: ngan song ltung ba'i las kyi sgrib pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)006:1855: tshe 'di la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras
NK085(ru)006:1856: kyi dam par dgongs nas bsrung zhing skyobs par mdzad
NK085(ru)006:1857: la / shi 'phos nas kyang bde bar gshegs pa
NK085(ru)006:1858: rnams kyi sras kyi thu bor gyur bar gdon mi
NK085(ru)006:1862: gang zhig sdig pa'i las byas pa //
NK085(ru)006:1863: dge bas 'gebs par byed pa ste //
NK085(ru)006:1864: sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar //
NK085(ru)006:1867: de lta bu'i dam tshig rim pa ni phra zhing zab la /
NK085(ru)006:1868: gang zag rang rgyud pa rnams gnas skabs su yud
NK085(ru)006:1869: tsam la'ang nyon mongs pa'i kun rtog ni pha mtha'
NK085(ru)006:1870: yas shing / nyes ltung yang de'i rjes 'gro bzhin
NK085(ru)006:1871: bsags pa chos nyid bshags sbyangs la rgyun du brtson
NK085(ru)006:1872: yas shing / dgos te / tshor te nyams pa
NK085(ru)006:1873: dang ma tshor te nyams pa'i sdig ltung mtha' yas
NK085(ru)006:1874: yas shing / dgos te / pa'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)006:1875: 'on kyang yig brgya bshags rgyud sogs la kha ton
NK085(ru)006:1877: mu cor smra ba dag /bshags rgyu ci thon zer
NK085(ru)006:1878: ba sogs kyi 'phya khrel gyi gnas su byed pa
NK085(ru)006:1879: mthong ste / de dag ni rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyi cha shas rtogs pa ci lta /
NK085(ru)006:1880: dge sdig gi phan nyes cung zad kyang ma go ba'i skyon zad de /
NK085(ru)006:1882: log pa'i lam la mtha' med phyir //
NK085(ru)006:1883: de dag 'dir ni spro bya min //
NK085(ru)006:1885: tshul 'dir la la dag blo rmong gti mug gi
NK085(ru)006:1886: mun pas sgrib te dam tshig ces pa ci yin
NK085(ru)006:1888: la las dam tshig ces pa bsrung dgos rgyu tsam go rung bsrung yul /
NK085(ru)006:1892: khe nyen sogs kyi rnam bzhag gang yang mi shes
NK085(ru)006:1893: par rmus long thang du 'khyams pa lta bu dang
NK085(ru)006:1894: / la la bsrung bya'i rnams bzhag cha tsam blo
NK085(ru)006:1895: yul du long kyang spang len ji bzhin par lag
NK085(ru)006:1896: tu ma len pa'i bag med kyi g.yeng ba dang
NK085(ru)006:1897: shes bzhin khyad gsod kyi 'dor ba ste rgyu 'bras
NK085(ru)006:1898: la rtsi bzhag mi byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1899: nyams shing chags pa byung ba dag kyang dngos brgyud
NK085(ru)006:1900: thabs kyi brtson pas bshags blo lta ci 'gyod sems
NK085(ru)006:1901: tsam yang med par ci dgar btang snyoms kyi bor
NK085(ru)006:1902: ba dang / 'ga' zhig rang la bka' drin che
NK085(ru)006:1903: chung gi rje 'gro bzhin dam bsrung ba ma yin
NK085(ru)006:1904: par bla ma'i stobs dang mnga' thang la dpag ste
NK085(ru)006:1905: de dang bstun 'jug gi sgo nas dam bsrung tshul
NK085(ru)006:1906: sogs mdor na tshul mthun gyi spyod pa ni nyungs
NK085(ru)006:1907: ba dang / zhing / gang ltar bla ma dam
NK085(ru)006:1908: tshig gi gnang bkag gi rnam dbye ston mkhan dang
NK085(ru)006:1909: ba dang / zhing / / slob ma dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:1910: gi bsrung sems tsam yod pa gnyis ka nyin mo'i
NK085(ru)006:1911: skar ma lta bur mthong bas yid skyo ba las
NK085(ru)006:1912: kyang ches skyo ba'i gnas nyid do //
NK085(ru)006:1913: de'i rgyu mtshan gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba dbang dang /
NK085(ru)006:1914: dbang gi rtsa ba dam tshig ces dbang dpe lag
NK085(ru)006:1915: tu bsnams tshad kyi zhal nas chu rgyug pa ltar
NK085(ru)006:1916: gsungs kyang de'i don shes mkhan dang /
NK085(ru)006:1917: nyams su blang mkhan ji tsam du mchis /
NK085(ru)006:1918: gzur gnas mkhyen ldan rnams dgongs pas gzigs tshe /
NK085(ru)006:1919: kho bos kun slong phrag dog nga rgyal rang mtho
NK085(ru)006:1920: khyad gsod 'gran sems kyis zur za yin min des
NK085(ru)006:1921: rtogs shing / de yang thog mar rtog gzhib gang
NK085(ru)006:1922: yang med par grags pa kho na yid bskyod pa'am
NK085(ru)006:1923: dbang lung dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan /
NK085(ru)006:1925: ma thob pa'i nyes dmigs sogs kyi rnam dbye gang
NK085(ru)006:1926: yang mi shes par bum pa phyag tu bzung tshad
NK085(ru)006:1927: kyi phyag zhabs su mgo rgu sa snyed na ma
NK085(ru)006:1928: snyed dang / glegs bam glog tshad kyi gral du
NK085(ru)006:1929: rna ba gtod rgyu byung na ma byung na byed
NK085(ru)006:1930: snyed dang / par snang yang / phyin chad ci mdzad legs mthong /
NK085(ru)006:1931: ci gsungs tshad mar byed pas mnyes pa gsum gyis
NK085(ru)006:1932: zhabs tog sgrub pa lta zhog /rjes su dpyad pa
NK085(ru)006:1933: sna tshogs su zhugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:1934: log lta btang snyoms sogs kyi dbang du thal te
NK085(ru)006:1935: dam nyams kyis steng gang ba'i tshul 'di lta bu'i
NK085(ru)006:1936: shan gyis yul khams kun tu'ang nad yams 'khrugs rtsod
NK085(ru)006:1937: sad ser btsa' than sogs mi 'dod pa'i nyes tshogs
NK085(ru)006:1938: char bzhin du 'bab pa tshad mas grub mngon no
NK085(ru)006:1939: // yang 'ga' zhig bla ma'i mtshan nyid brtags pa'ang ma yin /
NK085(ru)006:1940: dam tshig gi khe nyen shes pa yang ma yin par de dang go sa mnyam pa'o //
NK085(ru)006:1941: 'dra mnyam du yod re ba zhig gis rang gis ltag tshugs kho na gtso bor 'dzin pa'ang /
NK085(ru)006:1942: mthong med snang tshul la tshad bzung ci yod te btang snyoms 'ga' zhig gis gnas so //
NK085(ru)006:1943: sngar gyi skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rang rang gi bla ma dam tshig bsrung ba'i tshul dang /
NK085(ru)006:1944: da lta yang kho bo'i skyabs gcig pu nges pa
NK085(ru)006:1945: don gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po rig 'dzin rgyal
NK085(ru)006:1946: ba'i dbang po tshe dbang nor bu sogs skyes chen
NK085(ru)006:1947: 'ag'i rang gi bla mar brten phyin go sa mtho
NK085(ru)006:1948: dman la ma ltos phyag dang ldang ba zhes bkur
NK085(ru)006:1949: bsti yon tan brjod pa sogs kyi rnam thar ni
NK085(ru)006:1950: blo'i ra bas gzhal ba'i yul las 'das kyang /
NK085(ru)006:1951: dbang bskur chos 'chad kyi ngang tshul ji snyed pas
NK085(ru)006:1952: 'gro blo bsgyur zhing phugs yul bla mi rnam thar
NK085(ru)006:1953: la blo mi gtod cing yid mi bston pa 'ga'
NK085(ru)006:1954: la dpag na / rang bzhin shugs kyi dam tshig
NK085(ru)006:1955: la 'gal nyams byung na ma gtogs bla ma dang
NK085(ru)006:1956: rgyu 'bras la brtsi bzhag dor ba'i btang snyoms med
NK085(ru)006:1957: la dpag na / khul dang / bla ma'i rnam
NK085(ru)006:1958: thar dran pas dad pa'i spu long g.yo zhing gdung
NK085(ru)006:1959: shugs kyi mchi ma 'a khrugs pa skabs res 'ga'
NK085(ru)006:1960: ma yin par 'char zhing blo snying brang gsum gtod
NK085(ru)006:1961: pa'i bsam pa ni rgyun du yod pa bcas dang
NK085(ru)006:1962: dam cung zad yod gras su chud dam snyams pa
NK085(ru)006:1963: yang rang blo lkogs su ma gyur pa rgyal ba
NK085(ru)006:1964: sras bcas kyi mkhyen pa'i yul te de yang gang
NK085(ru)006:1965: gi tshad med pa'i bka' drin dang rgyud byin gyis
NK085(ru)006:1966: rlabs pa'i thugs rje kho na las byung bar sems
NK085(ru)006:1967: te rang gi gnas tshul zhar byung du smos la
NK085(ru)006:1968: 'dir mthong yul gyi kha dog bzhin /
NK085(ru)006:1969: drang po'i gtam gyi brjod tshig sna tshogs su song
NK085(ru)006:1970: yang gcig shos dag rang skyon la brtags pa'i blo
NK085(ru)006:1971: sems nang du kha bzlog la zug rgyu'i rkyen du
NK085(ru)006:1972: mi 'gyur pa zhig gsol ba snying nas 'debs pa
NK085(ru)006:1973: mchog dman kun gyis dgongs 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)006:1974: de ltar dam tshig rnam grangs rgya mtsho'i gter //
NK085(ru)006:1975: ji snyed don zab ji bzhin rtogs dka' yang //
NK085(ru)006:1976: rgyud dang de 'grel bla ma'i man ngag gis //
NK085(ru)006:1977: bdag rgyud bslan mthus cung zad tsam 'di gleng //
NK085(ru)006:1978: 'on kyang dengs skabs snyigs ma'i rnal 'byor gyi //
NK085(ru)006:1979: bla ma phal cher 'du 'dzi'i g.yengs bas khyer //
NK085(ru)006:1980: gzhan snang blo 'bring sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
NK085(ru)006:1981: tshe 'di'i 'dod zhen khe grags don du gnyer //
NK085(ru)006:1982: rgyud dang gdams pa'i gnad rnams thos bsam gyis //
NK085(ru)006:1983: gtan la ma phebs lag len 'chol nyog spyod //
NK085(ru)006:1984: dam tshig lta ba sngags dang phya rgya rnams //
NK085(ru)006:1985: gnad du ma song lha sngags rtag chad 'dzin //
NK085(ru)006:1986: bla ma rgyang bor rang che thabs kyis 'don //
NK085(ru)006:1987: rgyud pa'i skang tshugs mi zin ris med rlom //
NK085(ru)006:1988: kha bsags tshul chos g.yo rgyu'i yo langs des //
NK085(ru)006:1989: blun rnams mgu la rang yang gzengs su mtho //
NK085(ru)006:1990: slob ma phal cher ngan rtog dug chu'i myos //
NK085(ru)006:1991: mdzad pa'i cha shas tsam la'ang rtogs dpyod zhugs //
NK085(ru)006:1992: yon tan mi mthong skyon la mdzub ris btsug /mnyam 'grogs spyod pas nyes ltung zhar du bsags //
NK085(ru)006:1993: zas nor 'bag pa tshe 'di'i skyong bran la //
NK085(ru)006:1994: bka' drin snying po yin pa'i nges shes kyis //
NK085(ru)006:1995: dad pa'i rnam 'gyur de yis rang gzugs bstan //
NK085(ru)006:1996: phyi ma'i don la bsam gzhig rgyang du bsrings //
NK085(ru)006:1997: dpon slob phal cher 'ar 'ur mdzes spyod kyi //
NK085(ru)006:1998: kun rtogs tshon ris 'ja' la zhen cing 'thas //
NK085(ru)006:1999: gcig shos gnyis dran kun spyod mang po yis //
NK085(ru)006:2000: za za'i g.yengs bas rang snang bslu zhing brid //
NK085(ru)006:2001: tshul des gang nas sems kyang che phra kun //
NK085(ru)006:2002: bzang po'i bslab byar yid bston mi 'jug pas //
NK085(ru)006:2003: g.yo 'phrul gtso bor 'don pa'i thabs mkhas na //
NK085(ru)006:2004: rta mchog dul ba bzhin du gar yang brin //
NK085(ru)006:2005: 'phral phugs chos la dkri ba'i bsam spyod gang //
NK085(ru)006:2006: skyugs nad can la ro brgya'i kha zas bzhin //
NK085(ru)006:2007: dri tsam bstan kyang sems la mi 'babs pas //
NK085(ru)006:2008: mi smra ba nyid yang zab gnad du go //
NK085(ru)006:2009: de phyir snyigs dus mi la phan sems kyis //
NK085(ru)006:2010: nyes las ldog kyang yon tan skyon mthong chos //
NK085(ru)006:2011: mnga' thang phongs pa bdag 'dra'i legs bshad rtsa //
NK085(ru)006:2012: dregs pas brgyag pa'i nor skyong spyod snyams med //
NK085(ru)006:2013: 'on kyang rang dang ris mthun skal ldan 'gar //
NK085(ru)006:2014: phan phyir tsam 'di dwangs bas nyes longs las //
NK085(ru)006:2015: smin grol lam ston rdo rje'i slob dpon mchog /gtsug gi nor ltar brten la gsol ba thob //
NK085(ru)006:2016: de yang rtsa lag bla ma'i rnam dbye bzhan //
NK085(ru)006:2017: bkur tshul rim pas g.yo zol med pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:2018: sgo gsum dad brten khyad par sku gsum sems //
NK085(ru)006:2019: ngo sprod mchog de snying ltar bkur bar mdzod //
NK085(ru)006:2020: lha sngags ting 'dzin ye shes rol pa yis //
NK085(ru)006:2021: snang grags rtogs tshogs chos skur rtogs dka' yang //
NK085(ru)006:2022: mos spyod kyis zhugs lha bsgom sngags bzla zhing //
NK085(ru)006:2023: rjes dpag tshad mas gtan la pheb par mdzod //
NK085(ru)006:2024: gsang sngags lam ni gsang bas grub pas na //
NK085(ru)006:2025: gsang ba bcu po tshul bzhin bstan srungs te //
NK085(ru)006:2026: nyams len rtag tshad kha chos ma khyer bar //
NK085(ru)006:2027: mchog thun dngos grub ring min bsnyes pas 'bad //
NK085(ru)006:2028: mched kyi dam tshig spyir btang dmigs gsal gyis //
NK085(ru)006:2029: rnam dbye mang yang khyad par nang 'dres spun //
NK085(ru)006:2030: bla ma dkyil 'khor gcig gi bsdus gyur gang //
NK085(ru)006:2031: brtse dungs rgyun chad med pas skyongs par mdzod //
NK085(ru)006:2032: spyir na dam tshig rgya che grangs mang zhing //
NK085(ru)006:2033: sems kyi rgyun tsam la'ang rtag khyab pas //
NK085(ru)006:2034: nyes byas ltung ba zhal du 'byung ba'i phyir //
NK085(ru)006:2035: bshags pa'i las la rtag tu brtson pa gnad //
NK085(ru)006:2036: gzhan yang dal 'byor rten 'di rnyed dka' zhing //
NK085(ru)006:2037: lan gcig thob pa'ang stes dbang ma yin pas //
NK085(ru)006:2038: gser gling stong log gyur na a re 'gyod //
NK085(ru)006:2039: sgo gsum chos kyi phyogs su 'bad 'bung thon //
NK085(ru)006:2040: do nub tsam zhig mi 'chi'i gdengs med nas //
NK085(ru)006:2041: yun ring sdod pa'i grab shom mang po yis //
NK085(ru)006:2042: rang gi rang nyid bslu na phung tshabs che //
NK085(ru)006:2043: de bas blo sna nang du skyil bar gyis //
NK085(ru)006:2044: dper na rang lus las byung grib ma bzhin //
NK085(ru)006:2045: dkar nag las bsags 'bras bu rang nyid dang //
NK085(ru)006:2046: lhan cig 'brel bas sdig spangs dge bsgrub la //
NK085(ru)006:2047: nan tan 'bad nas thar pa'i lam snyegs 'tshal //
NK085(ru)006:2048: mdor na chos kun nyams len snying po ni //
NK085(ru)006:2049: sdom pa gsum gyi lam yin de las kyang //
NK085(ru)006:2050: sngags kyi dam tshig yang snying thun pa ste //
NK085(ru)006:2051: lus srog ltos med 'bad pas bsrung 'tshal gyi //
NK085(ru)006:2052: de skad smras pa grong tshig rnyogs ma la //
NK085(ru)006:2053: legs bshad yan lag brgyad kyis phongs na yang //
NK085(ru)006:2054: lhag bsam dkar pos ched du spel ba gang //
NK085(ru)006:2055: yid kyi yol gor smon na don chen grub //
NK085(ru)006:2056: 'on kyang blo mig dag pa 'phangs pa'i sa //
NK085(ru)006:2057: rnyed pa ltar ci tshogs sbyor lam sne tsam //
NK085(ru)006:2058: ma chud rmong blo'i skyon gyi cha shas kun //
NK085(ru)006:2059: bla ma lha dang mkha' 'gror snying nas bshags //
NK085(ru)006:2060: 'dir 'bad rab dkar legs byas bsod nams mthus //
NK085(ru)006:2061: ma nor dam tshig spang len rtag spyod cing //
NK085(ru)006:2062: sel med rgyud pa 'dzin pa'i bu slob kyis //
NK085(ru)006:2063: phyogs kun yongs khengs chos dkar 'phrin las rlabs //
NK085(ru)006:2064: ches 'phro'i bstan 'dzin tshogs kun sku tshe brtan //
NK085(ru)006:2065: bzhed pa gcig mthun mdo rgyud man ngag gis //
NK085(ru)006:2066: dgongs don zab mo'i shing rtas rgya chen 'gro //
NK085(ru)006:2067: srid mtsho las sgrol gtan bde'i sar skyol shog /khyad par nges gsang chos kun snying po'i bcud //
NK085(ru)006:2068: rdo rje snying po'i bstan pa kun nas kun //
NK085(ru)006:2069: gsal zhing gang pas log smra bdud sde'i dpung //
NK085(ru)006:2070: ma lus lam 'di'i grom la rgyal kun gyis //
NK085(ru)006:2071: 'phrin las byed por skyes dang tshe rabs kun //
NK085(ru)006:2072: bdag nyid gyur te spangs rtogs mthar phyin pa'i //
NK085(ru)006:2073: mgon po sku gsum ngo bo myur 'grub cing //
NK085(ru)006:2074: srid pa'i gnas kun gtan nas stong byed shog /zhes
NK085(ru)006:2075: dam tshig gi rim pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos
NK085(ru)006:2076: zhes shar rgyal mo rong gi bla ma bsod nams
NK085(ru)006:2077: ye shes kyi nan tan chen po gsung gis bskul
NK085(ru)006:2078: bar mdzad cing / de'i rjes 'thud du grogs dam pa 'gas kyang bskul mdzad na'ang /
NK085(ru)006:2079: ji ltar dengs sang dus dbang gis gal chung chos
NK085(ru)006:2080: la byed pa'i rnam thar sha stag gis sngon gyis
NK085(ru)006:2081: mkhas grub du ma'i legs bshad rnams kyang nyin gcig
NK085(ru)006:2082: gi kha phye ba'i rtogs dpyod tsam la blo 'jug
NK085(ru)006:2083: mkhan med par nged kyi skye ba gong ma'am /
NK085(ru)006:2084: bla ma gong ma phyag dpe yin zhes khyim sbugs
NK085(ru)006:2085: su brtsegs pa kho na gtso bor bzung ba las
NK085(ru)006:2086: / rang nyid kyi thos bsam byed cing gzhan de la sbyor ba sogs med pa dang /
NK085(ru)006:2087: gal srid sbyor kyang blo yid chos la 'jug pa dang bral tshe /
NK085(ru)006:2088: ngan pa bdag lta bu'i rtsom pas gzhan phan gyi nus pa zad kyang /
NK085(ru)006:2089: re zung tsam gyis nyams su len pa srid mtha' ma bkag phyir dang /
NK085(ru)006:2090: bskul ba po'i gsung mi gcog ched du grub dbang
NK085(ru)006:2091: nam mkha'i snying po'i skye ba gong 'og gi thugs
NK085(ru)006:2092: rjes rgyud brlan rjes su 'jug pa ste /
NK085(ru)006:2093: sa la kyi nyer len la sprul sku'i ming gi
NK085(ru)006:2094: sgro 'dog 'phrin las bstan 'dzin pas kahthoga rdo rje
NK085(ru)006:2095: gdan gyi bla brang gi yang rtser grub par sbyar
NK085(ru)006:2096: ba'i yi ge rang nyid kyi sug las su bstar
NK085(ru)006:2097: ba ste dge bas rang gzhan lam zhugs rnams dam
NK085(ru)006:2098: tshig spang len 'dor med du brtson pa'i 'bras bu
NK085(ru)006:2099: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i dam tshig gi don mngon sum
NK085(ru)006:2100: du rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig //
